Yimin andowoon yiri kuu Godbed ambidiib okadiib ongmenaboon,
kumban okad kuu wuub nimingkindo, angkon kumkam maayiibban. Kwane kumun kumbed kebenoon. God ye Kingkin kuu ok animari wedyambed yarebeen.
Godbed yedmoon “Namborok.” andoona namboroon.
Namboroone, wedmekore “Amun kii.” andoon. Andekore, yembed nambiriyiib kumuniib kuu andokbe yeka yeka keroon.
Kwanekore, nambiri yaningko kuu “Awingyab” andekore, kumun yaningko kuu “Amnoom” ande keroon. Mirikne ware amkimo keroone, aron mimo keroon.
Kwanoone, Godbed yedmoon, “Ok yiri kuu yuka keruko, ok ari kuu yeka keroko, wedya kuu nuub yeman kerok.” andoona kwanoon.
Godbed mindong yi dangimbon ongmekore ok ari dore ok yiri dore wedya kowoon.
Kowe Godbed mindong yi dangimbon yaningko kuu “Ambid” andoon. Mirikne ware amkimo keroone, aron ayoob keroon.
Kwanoone, Godbed yedmoon, “Ok yiri kuu kanmimyirimo keruko, bid kuu yaro angkimburuko.” andoona, kwanoon.
Bid kuu “Okad” ande, ok kuu “Karamok” ande keroon. Kwane wedmekore “Amun kii.” andoon.
Kwanandekore yedmoon, “Aya kereeka nonga yuma oma mongkob animan maa maa animaibka animaibbanka korem dembok.” andoona, kwanoon.
Yi korem kuu yi kawiib yowiib. Wedmekore, “Amun kii.” andoon.
Mirikne ware amkimo keroone, aron ayoobmim keroon.
Kwanoone, Godbed yedmoon, “Nambiri kuu ambid arimbed menebok. Yi dowad kuu awingyab yemaniib amnoom yemaniib weeb kimingki yemaniib
ambid arimbed okad yiri yuri yemaniib.” andekore,
aroniib woodiib mindongiib ongmenaboon. Aron kuu awingyab ye nambiri darewoob yeman. Wood kuu aron arebban amnoom ye nambiri embeng yeman.
Ongme dowan kerekore, ambid ari nongkoboon. Ambid ari nongkoboon kuu okad yiri yuri ye dowadiib,
awingyawiib kumuniib andokbi ye dowadiib nongkoboon. Yuriiwe, wedmekore, “Amun kii.” andoon.
Mirikne ware amkimo keroone, aron kaning keroon.
Kwanoone, Godbed yedmoon, “Ok yiri dingkan maa maayiib muubnoko ayari on maa maayiib dembe ambid ari wanyarebime.” andekore,
karamok yiri ye dingkan miin kambari maa maayiib ok yiri dingkan yena koremiib kuu ongmenaboone ok yiri muubniwen. Ok yiri ye dingkan korem komarewa ongmenaboon kuu kwamunemo. Ayari on maa maa kangkon ongmenaboon. Ayari on korem komarewa ongmenaboon kuu kwamunemo. Wedmekore, “Amun kii.” andoon.
Godbed yi yaa amun kerunde yedmendoon, “Yiib ok yiri ye dingkan kuu mana yemoon kere ok yiri muubne wonok. Ayari on yiib kangkon mana yemoon kere wonok.” andoon.
Mirikne ware amkimo keroone, aron angko keroon.
Kwanoone, Godbed yedmoon, “Bid ari dingkan maa maayiib amongkowiib kiiwiib kuu okad yaambed dembenib yiib komarewa ongmenabaan kuu kwamunemo yemoon kerime.” andekore,
bid ari dingkan maa maa korem ongmenaboon. Dingkan korem komarewa ongmenaboon kuu kwamunemo. Wedmekore, “Amun kii.” andoon.
Kwanandekore yedmoon, “Nubbed nimakarub nuwareb ongmem. Yi kuu ok yiri ooniib ayari oniib dingkan kiiwiib amongkowiib darewoowiib embengiib dingkan korem yariman kerok.” andoon.
Andekore, God ye kuruwak areb nimakarub ongmenaboon, ambiyiib yingkiyiib.
Yi yaa kuu amun kerunde yedmoon, “Dana yemoon woongkanabime. Okad yimin yimin yaa muubnime. Okad kumundin yaa oonime. Dingkan korem kuu yariman kerime, ok yiri ooniib ayari oniib dingkan korem bid ari yarebimaiwiib kui.” andoon.
Kwanandekore yedmoon, “Kedi, yob irimaan yeman koremiib ayowiib yiib yaa kondaan, yiib animan kui.
Bid ari dingkaniib ayari oniib dingkan korem bid ari yarebimaiwiib yaa kuu kereekiib bukiib kondaan, yi animan kui.” andoona, kwanoon.
Godbed ongmenaboon korem yaa wedmendekore, “Korem amun yeman kii.” andoon. Mirikne ware amkimo keroone, aron benme keroon.
Kwane ambidiib okadiib kuna kuna dangoon ye kumkam korem ongmenabe dowan keroon.
Kowe, God kuu aron ed kuu deme korem dowan keroon kowe dibere yiidkoon.
Kwane, yembed aron kee amun kerunekore karadmo yeman ande kowoon, amborom kuu ongmenabi deme korem dowan keroon ye dowad dibere yiidkoon kowe.
Kuye weng kuu Godbed ambidiib okadiib kumkam korem ongmenaboon ye weng kui.|H Yariman Godbed ongme dowan kerindo kuyaron kuu
yongbon kawa aya nonga kuu deedirindo amborom kuu am yedmindo kowe monokban keroon. Kwane kuyaa kuu karub maa yongbon kaab deme ambangkaneen ye karuwiibban.
Am minindo kuned ok kuu okad yirimbed deedereen. Deedereenu, bid ari kuu okiib dange wuneen.|U
Kuyaron kuu okad aandune karub ongmene miiddem aombed inum konoone demboon.
Demboone, Yariman Godbed aron dembimaun angka yongbon kaab arumoone demboon, Iden aom kuu. Arume dowan kerekore, kuyaom kuu karub ongmoon kuu kowoona doboroon.
Kwane, Yariman Godbed at amun maa maayiib dembok andoone daare wonoon kuu, at ani yemaniib wedme kubi yemaniib kui. Yongbon kidangka kuyaom kuu at ayoob demboon. At mimo kuu wadkeri ye at. At mamaa kuu arewa o amun inamen kaadkeri ye at.|H
Yongbon Iden kuyaombed ok kuu wene ari bokon kaningiib danganabeen.
Ok ibduruk doween kuu yaningko Paison, Havila ambibkin aom awanewandeen.
(Havila ambibkin aom kuu gold amuniib at nunung baeb amuniib od darewoob ye botiib dangoon.)
Ok mamaa yaningko kuu Gihon, Kus ambibkin aom awanewandeen.
Ok mamaa yaningko kuu Taigris, Asiria ambibkin kangkambed awanewandeen. Ok mamaa yaningko kuu Yufretes.|U
Yongbon Iden aom karub kuu Yariman Godbed kowoon ye dowad kuu oone dobere ambangki yeman.
Kwamune Yariman Godbed yedmoon, “Eb kuu ayob korem kee ananeeb kuu yimin,
kumban arewa o amun inamen kaadkeri ye ayob kuu anaab, kuu amob kowe. Ananeeb kuu anam bobnaneeb kowe.” andoon.
Kwamune Yariman Godbed yedmoon, “Yembedmo dobiri kuu amunban kowe, nembed ye yaa awaneni ye angkodmiyiib ongmaniin.” andoon.
Kwanekore, okad andune dingkan koremiib ayari on koremiib ongmenabe karub yaa benmonoona, yi aningko korem yeengkanandoon.
Yeengkanande dowan keroon, kumban yangkodmi ma wedmindo.
Kwanoone, Yariman Godbed karub yaa meenoone unuk darewoob angkoone, karub ye anaatok mimo daandekore, ye kad ika ongmekore,
angkon anaatokbed wonong ongmekore, ye yaa nenmene
domonenoona, karub kuu yaro wedmendekore yedmoon, “Kwamune kowe, yu kono kuu ne konombed kandene, yu yom kuu ne yombed kandene keroon kowe, yu aningko kuu Wonong kowaan, amborom kuu karub yaambed kandoon kowe.” andoon.
Kwamunekob, karub kuu yarian yaa domonde ye amban yoom dabokne yi ayoob kuu id mimo kerimaib.
Yi ayoob ebkadiibban idmo doriib kuned karakiibban.
Yariman Godbed ongmenaboon ye dingkan korem yaa kuu niinbed nemengkandi kuu burudandoon. Kwane, niinbed wonong yaa kaamondoon, “Anam kuu Godbed ayob korem yaa kuu anaib ande amob kowoon dee?” andoon.
Andoone, wonongbed niin yaa man yedmeen, “Nub kuu ayob korem kuu animaub kuu yimin,
kumban ayob mimo kee nub animokban Godbed amob kowoon nub yaa. Yembed yedmoon, ‘Anaib, awinaib. Kwane ananiib o awinaniib kuu bobnaniib.’ andoon.” andeen.
Anduune, niinbed yedmendoon, “Dowan, anam kuu yiib kuu bobnaibban.
God yekaad yiib kuu ayob kee ananiib kuu yiib inamen nandaneene God areb keraniib. Kwane komo komo kuu inamen arewa o amun kuu kaadkeraniib.” andoon.
Andoona, wonong ayob wedmeen kuu ani yeman amun dangoone wedme ani dowakeniib meeneen, “Ne dowaken kuu aneni meeni kangdom kandandid.” andekoru kande aneen. Anekoru, yu karuwiib kanwene konuune yeyiib anoon.
Ane dowan kerekoriwa, yi inamen nandoone wedme binangkiwen ebkadiibban idmo kowe. Kwani kowe, yi ayoob yedob biid wane kaarangke borokiwen.
Kwane, oobnon yaambed wengambiriiwe Yariman God kuu mongkob kidangkambed meneen. Wengamberekoriwa, awunumbon yaa bikniwen.
Bikne doriiwe, Yariman Godbed karub yaa baande kaamonoon, “Kuna yaa doreeb?” andoon.
Andoone, karubbed neman yedmoon, “Mongkob kidangkambed meneewe wengambaraan kowe, ebkadiibban idmo kowe uneni wene biknaan.” andoon.
Andoone, Godbed kaamonoon, “Kanembed yedmebdoonkob ebkadiibban idmo doreeb? Ayob amob kowaan kuu anewenoo?” andoon.
Andoone, karubbed neman yedmoon, “Wonong ebbed ne yaa kawewen kumbed ayob kee kawuune anaan kii.” andoon.
Andoone, Yariman Godbed yu yaa kaamondoon, “Komarewa kwamewen kee?” andoon. Andoone, wonongbed man yedmeen, “Niinbed ne yaa nemengkawoone anaan kii.” andeen.
Kwani kowe, Yariman Godbed niin yaa yedmenoon, “Kwanewen kowe, eb kuu butun darewoob kandeeb, dingkan amongkowiib dingkan kiiwiib korem arebban. Kibirebyambed wene aron korem, eb kuu kabeyob din ingkud ari irin wananeeb.
Dabab darewoob ke kowaan kee, eb yoom wonong yoom neman bon bon kamimamaniib kii. Kwani kowe, eb yob kuu wonong yu yowiib aron korem bon kerimamaniib. Yu yobbed eb korok kuu wowe monmaraneene ebbed yu yob ye yon daandum yaa domondaneeb.” andoon.
Kwanandekore, yembed wonong yaa yedmendoon, “Ongmaniina kub dana wooni yaron kuu yewed darewoob ariyiib. Dana woonaneeb kuu yewed darewoob kandaneeb kui. Kumban kub karub yaa dowaken keraneewe ye kuu kub korok keraneen.” andoon.
Kwanandekore, yembed Adam yaa yedmenoon, “Eb wonong yu weng wengamberekoreb anaib ande amob kowaan ye ayob kuu anewen kowe, okad kuu butun kande arewa keruun kii. Kwani kowe, ebkareb yongbon deme kuu yobdoodmo ambangkaneb ananeeb, kibikbed wene eb bobni yaron keranuun.
Kumban nongyikiib orikiib eb yongbon aom dembimamaneen kowe, animan kuu yiminban kerimamaneene dura animan bad wenebimamaneeb kii.
Ebkareb deme ambangke nimin kandenewe animan ananeeb. Eb kuu okadbed ongmaan kowe, bobnaneeb kuu okad keraneeb. Amborom kuu eb kuu ingkudmo kowe, bobnaneeb kuu ingkud ika keraneeb.” andoon.
Adambed yamban yu aningko Iv kowoon, amborom kuu yu kuu nimkarub korem yi ena kowe.
Kwani kowe, Yariman Godbed ba kadbed ebkad ongmekore, yi yaa bangkandoone borokiwen.
Kwane, Yariman Godbed yedmoon, “Karub kuu nuwareb keroon, komo komo kuu inamen arewa o amun kuu kaadkeroon kowe. Kwani kowe, yembed wadkeri ye ayob kuu kande ananeen kuu ne dowakenban, amborom kuu ananeen kuu bobnindeban keraneen kowe.” andoon.
Andekore, mongkob Iden aom kuu “Winime!” andoone bunangka winiwen. Winiiwe, Yariman Godbed yedmoon, “Eb kuu wene yongbon deme ambangke. Amborom kuu eb kuu okadbed ongmoon kowe. Yiib angkon mongkob Iden aom ika manaib, amob kowaan kowe.” andoon.
Mongkob Iden kangkambed engyus ayoowiib kerewang arimbed amot yumbuyiib nongkoboone kerewang kuu kanawadmeen. Kerewang kee wadkeri ye at ye kiwaan ari kebenoon.
Adam yamban yoom dangiiwe oyoomiib kereen. Kwanekoru, dana mingki wooneen. Woonekoru, yedmeen, “Yarimanbed awawoonkob mingki woone kandaan kii. Kwani kowe, yaningko kuu Kein.” andeen.
Amaan, angkon dana mingki mamaa Abel wooneen. Abel kuu dingkan amongkob oonembirimaan. Kein kuu yongbon deme ye karub keroon.
Amaanbed Kein kuu ye yongbonbed bene nengkane agedmo keroone baeb kuu Yariman yaa konoon.
Kwane, Abel kuu ye dingkan wonob dana aye ye yom kowiib kumbed bunge kanmene nengkane agedmo keroone baeb kuu Yariman yaa konoon. Kwane, Abelbed konoon kuu Yariman ye dowaken kerenoon,
kumban Keinbed konoon kuu ye dowakenban kerenoon. Dowakenban keroone, Kein kuu norin ye murubia anammo keroon.
Kwanoone, Yarimanbed Kein yaa yedmenoon, “Eb kuu komandewed norin wandewen? Komoyiibkob norin ye murubia kerewen?
Amun kamaneeb kuu dowaken kerubdaniine kubaneewoo? Kumban, amun kamaabban keraneeb kuu ambarakmimbed eb awinebdaneen. Ambarakmi inamenbed burudandubdandameen, kumban ebkareb ambarakmi yaa burudande dore!” andoon.
Kuye yoman kuu Keinbed ye daman yaa yedmenoon, “Mongkob angka wenem.” andoone winiwen. Wene dorekoriwa, ye daman kuu ayoone bobnoon.
Kwanoona, Yarimanbed Kein yaa kaamonenoon, “Eb daman Abel kuu kunaya doreen?” andoone, Keinbed neman yedmoon, “Nekaadban. Ne kuu ye oone dobiri ye karuwoo?” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Yarimanbed yedmenoon, “Komo kamewen kee? Wengambere. Eb daman ye umkan okad yiri kubudoroon kumbed ne yaa baandoona wengambaraan.
Kwani kowe, butun kabdaan kii, eb kuu yongbon deme awinideban amborom kuu ebbed eb daman aye wene ye umkan okad yiri kubudoroon kowe.
Eb yongbon kuu dembaanban. Eb kuu nane kibine dobiri ye karubban kereeb! Eb kuu wedyamo dewenebi ye karub kereeb kii!” andoon.|H
Andoone, Keinbed neman yedmoon “Kee dabab darewoob oi! Ne kuu yiminban!
Kibikee ne kuu yongbon deme ambangkideban, eb amob kaweeb kowe. Angkon ne kuu eb dia minideban. Ne kuu wedyamo dewenebi ye karub keraan kowe, karub mamaambed wedmewaneen kuu naneene bobnaniin!” andoon.
Andoone, Yariman Godbed yedmoon “Dowan, kanembed eb aneen kuu neman karub kurubmim inaniin.” andoon. Kwane, Yariman Godbed Kein ye binad ari amob akmi yeman kowe yedmoon “Kane amob akmi yeman wedmenaneen kuu ayi yemanban.” andoon.
Kwamunekore, Kein kuu Yariman God domonene wenene Dewenebi ambibkin angka doboroon. Aron dembimamuun angka Dewenebi ambibkin Iden yaa doboroon.
Kein yoom ye wonong yoom yi mingki Inok wooniwen. Kwanekore, Keinbed kambong nare yidmene ambib yenbekore kambong kuu ye karub dana yaningko Inok kowoon.
Inok ye mingki kuu Irad. Irad ye mingki kuu Mehudyael. Mehudyael ye mingki kuu Metusael. Metusael ye mingki kuu Lamek.
Lamek kuu nima ayoob awanmoon, Adah yoom Silah yoom.
Adahbed dana mingki Yabal wooneen. Ye kuu dingkan amongkob ooni ye karub yi awoya. Yi kuu parai kombon aombed dobirimamiib.
Ye daman yaningko kuu Yubal. Ye kuu yok kuweng amun wangkenabi ye karub yi awoya.
Silahbed dana mingki Tubal-Kein wooneen. Ye kuu yeengbed kumkam korem ongmenabi ye karub. Ye nengkan kuu Naama.
Lamekbed ye nima ayoob yaa daandoon “Wengambirime! Kewedmanbed noon kowe ayaane bobnoon.
Kwani kowe, Kein ayaniib ye kakman kuu karub kurubmimiib yeene inaniib, kumban ne naniib ye kakman kuu karub 77iib yeene inaniib kumbed yimin.” andoon.|U
Amaanbed, Adam yoom ye wonong yoom dangiiwe karub dana maa wooniwen. Woonekoru, yedmeen, “Godbed ne yaa mimyob keewene karub dana maa kawoon. Dana kee Abel kuu Keinbed ayoon ye yumbon kandi yeman. Kwani kowe, ne dana yaningko Set yedma.” andeen.
Angkon amaanbed Set yoom ye wonong yoom dana mingki Inos wooniwen. Kuyaron kumbed karub Yariman yaa baandi ye inamen andowiwen.|H
Adam ye awoya kuu kei. (Godbed karub kuu ye areb ongmoon.
Karuwiib wonongiib ongmekore amuniib kerundoon. Kerundekore, yedmoon “Yiib kuu karuwa wononga kii.” andoon.)
Adam kuu weeb 130yiib doberekore, ye mingki Set kuu woonoon. Ye kuu Adam areb.
Kwanekore, Adam ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 800iib doboroon.
Ye weeb korem kuu 930yiib doberene bobnoon.
Set kuu weeb 105iib doberekore, ye mingki Inos kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Set ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 807iib doboroon.
Ye weeb korem kuu 912iib doberene bobnoon.
Inos kuu weeb 90yiib doberekore, ye mingki Kenan kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Inos ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 815iib doboroon.
Ye weeb korem kuu 905iib doberene bobnoon.
Kenan kuu weeb 70yiib doberekore, ye mingki Mahalalel kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Kenan ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 840yiib doboroon.
Ye weeb korem kuu 910iib doberene bobnoon.
Mahalalel kuu weeb 65iib doberekore, ye mingki Yared kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Mahalalel ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 830yiib doboroon.
Ye weeb korem kuu 895iib doberene bobnoon.
Yared kuu weeb 162yiib doberekore, ye mingki Inok kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Yared ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 800iib doboroon.
Ye weeb korem kuu 962yiib doberene bobnoon.
Inok kuu weeb 65iib doberekore, ye mingki Metusela kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Inok ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 300iib God ye dowakeniib doboroon.
Ye weeb korem kuu 365iib doboroon
kuned Godbed nendoon, amborom kuu ye kuu God ye murubia ari amunmo doboroon ye karub kowe. Kwani kowe, korem wonoon, okad yiri dobirindo.
Metusela kuu weeb 187iib doberekore, ye mingki Lamek kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Metusela ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 782yiib doboroon.
Ye weeb korem kuu 969iib doberene bobnoon.
Lamek kuu weeb 182yiib doberekore, ye mingki kuu woonoon.
Woonekore, Lamekbed yedmoon “Yariman Godbed arewa kondoon okad kiri kee kowe dana kee nub yaa awandi ye kiwaan ongmaneen. Kwani kowe, dana kee yaningko Noa andaan kii.” andoon.
Kwanekore, Lamek ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 595iib doboroon.
Ye weeb korem kuu 777iib doberene bobnoon.
Noa kuu weeb 500iib doberekore, karub dana ayoobmim Sem yoom Hem yoom Yeefet yoom wanaboon.
Kuyaambed karuwa nimaya okad yemoon muubniwen.
Kuye niindem aom kuu okad yiri ye nimakoyu kerengkandimboniib dobiriwen. God ye karubbed wedmibka nimakoyu kerengkandimbonmo kowe, ebka neka kame biwen.
Angkon Yariman Godbed yedmoon “Kwana kowe, ne kuu kerendobaraina karub weeb darewoob dobaraibban, amborom kuu yi dobiri arewa keroon kowe. Weeb 120iib kwari burudande dobaraibban.” andoon.
Kurin kuyaron yaa dobiriwen kuu karub dareb dareb doboob doboob dobiriwen. Yi kuu God ye karubbed wene Godiibban yi nima biwen yi dana. Yi kuu kanangkod kayirin kamenabidan.|U
Kwane, Yariman wedmoonka nimakarub yi dobiriyiib inameniib korem kuu miin arewamo keroon kowe
yedmoon, “Ne niindem aom miin kubiyiibban keroon, komande nimakarub ongmaankob okad yiri doriib?
Kwani kowe, nimakaruwiib dingkaniib ayari oniib korem kuu okad yirimbed araniin kumbed yimin, amborom kuu ne mimyob darewoob kowaan, komande ongmaanka.” andoon.
Kumban Yariman kuu ye kubi dowakeniib Noa yaa.
Kekee Noa ye weng. Noa yembedmo inamen yorokmo awine doboroon. Kuyaron dobiriwen ye nimakarub kuu yembedmo ambarakmiyiib kii ande dedmone daandiyiibban ye karub keroon. Noamo kuu God ye murubia ari amunmo doboroon ye karub.
Ye karub dana ayoobmimiib kuu Sem yoom Hem yoom Yeefet yoom.
Amunmo meenme doboroon kumban nimakarub korem korem kuu ambarakmiyiib ayub aya yaambed dobiriwen, God ye kiringkono ari.
Godbed wedmoonka nimakarub yi dobiri korem kuu ambarakmimo.
Kwani kowe, Godbed Noa yaa yedmenoon, “Nimakarub korem monmaraniin, amborom kuu ayub aya yambedmo doriib kowe. Anamaa, nimakaruwiib okadiib monmaraniin.
Kwani kowe, ebbed at kamkonombed motod yenbe. Motod aombed ambinam yemoon ongmenabe. Angkon, at nunungbed motod aomiib angkayiib kuu ambe, ok aomnokban keri yeman.
Ku yenbaneeb kuu motod ye doboob kuu dingki bendom dore dingki birid dore kumbed kimingkanmo wene 300iib kere. Angkon, angkara angkara kuu dingki bendom dore dingki birid dore kumbed kimingkanmo wene 50iib kere. Angkon, yiri dore ari dore kuu kimingkanmo wene 30iib kere.
Ari kuu widbed kebene. Motod amkan dore ateni dore wedkuyaa nuub yeman ambongko dingki bendom dore dingki birid dore mimo aande. Ambongko mimo motod wedyambed aande. Motod aom kuu ambib yiriyiib ariyiib ayoobmim ongme.
Kedi, urok darewoob ongmaniina mananeen kumbed kane kane yi korem okad yiri wad doriib kuu duknaniib.
Kumban eb yaa ne weng ke yedme kowaan kei. Eb yoom eb karub dana yoom yiib amered yoom motod aom aomnaniib.
Ayari on maa maa koremiib dingkan maa maa koremiib wad doriib yeman maa maa koremiib ambiyiib yingkiyiib kuu menebiiwo motod aom be aomnekoreb oone.
<range>
Wad doriib yeman maa maa korem yi animaniib yiib animaniib korem be nongkobe.” andoon.
Noambed God ye weng kunduk dakmoon areb kuu korem kwanoon.
Kwane dowan kerekore, Yarimanbed Noa yaa yedmenoon, “Kibik yaron kuu ebbedmo amunmo doberewen kowe, eb yoom eb wonong yoom eb karub dana yi amered yoom motod aom aomnime.
Dingkan ani yeman maa maa korem ambi ediib yingki ediib ayari on maa maa korem ambi ediib yingki ediib durukman ye dingkan maa maa korem ambi mimoyiib yingki mimoyiib be aomnibko oonime. Dingkan be aomne oonibko amaanbed yemoon kereniwe muubnaniib.
<range>
Wene ari kuu aron ediib dowan keranuune nembed am darewoob yedmaniine mananuun. Aronki 40yiib amnoom 40yiib menembaranuun kii. Kwani kowe, nimakaruwa dingkana yi korem okad yiri dobirimaib kuu monmaraniin.” andoon.
Andoone, Noambed Yariman ye weng kunduk dakmoon kuu korem kwamunemo kamoon.|H
Noa ye weeb 600iib yaron kuu
Noa yoom ye wonong yoom ye karub dana ayoobmim yi amered yoom motod aom aomniwen.
God ye weng kunduk dakmoon areb kuu dingkan korem amongkowiib kiiwiib darewoowiib embengiib ambiyiib yingkiyiib Noa yaa menebe motod aom aomnekoriwa, Yariman Godbed ambongko kebenoon. Aron ediib dowan keroon kowe, wood ayoob aron 17 arimbed kuu ok darewoob okad niindem yirimbed bangkanandedeerebeenan wunuune ambid arimbed am darewoob okad yimin yimin yaa munuune kameen kowe, urok muneen. Kuyaron kuu aron 40yiib am darewoob menembureen, amkiyiib aronkiyiib.|U
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
<range>
Aronki 40yiib kuu urok derebeenu, motod kuu ok animari kanawaneen.|H
Kanawanekoru, ok animari kanawadmenmo dewenebuun.
Urok derebeenu, aangko darewoob korem kuu yukneen.
Derebe dowan kerekoru, okad korem kuu yukneen. Aangko dungkunbed dingkimbed kimingkanmo wene ok animarimbed ye ambab kuu 15iib.
Yukne dowan keruune, wadkeri yeman korem karuwa dingkana korem kuu dukniwen.|U
<range>
Nimakaruwiib dingkaniib ayari oniib, okad yiri wad doriibdan korem kuu monmare dowan keroon kuned, Noa awene yoom dingkan yoom motod aom aomniwendan kuu yimbedmo dobiriwen.|H
Okad korem yukneen yaron kuu 150yiib.
Noa awene yoom dingkan yoom motod aom aomniwen kuu Godbed nonondandindo. Kwani kowe, yedmoon “Nuub monok.” andoone monoone ok kuu igakman andowe keekne wuneen.
Kwanoone, okad niindem yirimbed ok kuu menebuun kuu kebene am kebene keroone,
aron 150yiib kuyaron kuu ok ika keekne wuneen.
Wood 7 aron 17 arimbed kuu motod kuu aangko Ararat ari angkibureen.
Ok keekne wuneene wood 10 arimbed kuu aangko maa maa kuu dian kereen.
Wene aron 40yiib dowan keruune wene ari kuu Noambed bunangka wedmi yeman ambongko nandene
ayari on binmo on kurud areb yaningko Reven kankoraroone wanwene ok animari wedyambed dewenebeen.
Amaan on kawanmo on kawa areb yaningko Dav kankoraroon amborom kuu ok kuu keekne dowan kereen ande meenoon.
Kankoraroone wanwuneen kuned okad akmindo kowe, ika wanmuneen amborom kuu ok kuu keekne dowan kerindo kowe. Ika wanmunuune, Noambed nende motod aom kowoon.
Wene aron ediib dowan keruune, on kawanmo ika kankoraroone,
wanyarebuune oobnembed ika wanmuneen kuu atbiidiib domone kanmuneen. Kwani kowe “Ok keekne dowan kereen yo.” ande meene yekaadkeroon.
Wene aron ediib dowan keruune ika kankoraroone wanwuneen kuned kuu ika minindo.
Noa ye weeb kuu 601iib kuyaron kuu wood mimo aron mimo keruune ok keekne dowan kereen. Kwanoone, Noambed wid yena bongme benkatmekore kerekanabe okad yiri wedmoon kuu okad kuu kamkono kere weneen.
Wene wood ayoob aron 27 keruune, okad kuu kokne kamkono kere wuneen.|U (Aronki yemoon dowan keruune, urok kuu keekne dowan keroone okad kuu kamkono kere kereen.)
Kwane, Godbed Noa yaa yedmoon,
“Eb yoom eb wonong yoom eb karub dana yoom yi amered yoom
okad yiri yemaniib ayari yemaniib dingkan maa maa koremiib bunangka angkanime. Dingkan korem ke be angkaneeb kee wenebe yemoon kere muubnaniib kii.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Noa yoom ye wonong yoom ye karub dana yoom yi amered yoom kuu bunangka angkaniwen.
Angkaniiwa, dingkan maa maa korem kuu yeka yeka angkane wenebiwen.
Angkon, Noambed bot wuube dingkan nengke agedmo keri yeman ye bon ongmekore, dingkan durukmanbaniib ayari oniib yaa maa maa bene kwari kiribekore, nengkane agedmo keroone baeb kuu Yariman yaa konoon.
Kwane, Yarimanbed kuyaa kuwekore yekareb yedmoon, “Amaan angkon okad kamune ne ika arewa kerundainban, kwane karubbed komo kamaniib yaa kui. Ne nekaad aron korem kuu nimakarub danambed wene aamkono yaa yi inamen kuu arewamo. Kumban, angkon nembed okad yiri wad doriibdan kuu angkon ika monmarainban, kibikee monmaraan kwamune.” andekore, ika yedmoon
“Aron kwane okad angkibaranuun yaa kuu animan kaab arumenabi yaroniib wanabi yaroniib, angkon yuruk aroniib nimin aroniib, angkon amaroniib yongkonbi aroniib, angkon amkiyiib aronkiyiib keremborok, dowan keraanban.” andoon.
Kwane, Godbed Noa yoom ye karub dana yoom yaa amun kerunde yedmoon, “Yiib dana yemoon yidwarok. Okad korem muubnok.
Dingkan koremiib ayari on koremiib okyiri oon koremiib kuu yiib yaa konob une dobirimamaniib. Yi kuu yiib dowakenmo komo kamaniib kuyaa kiribaana doriib.
Ne dingkan ye amob durukman bongmaan kowe, korem kuu ani yeman. Anuk kuu okad yirimbed kab kaini yeman [[ask: green plants]] kuu yiib ani yeman andaan kwamune areb kuu, kibikee dingkaniib ayari oniib okyiri ooniib korem kangkon yiib ani yeman andaan.
“Amob mimo kuu kei, dingkan id yaa umkaniib kwane anaib, amborom kuu umkanbed wadkeriyiib angkeen kowe.
Kanembed karub maa ayaneene bobnaneen kuu bobni ye dabab kandaneen. Dingkan kanembed karub ayaneene bobnaneen kwangkon bobni ye dabab kandaneen.
“Karub kuu God ye kuruwak areb ongmoon kowe, karub kanembed karub maa ayaneene bobnaneen kuu man kangkon karub yenambed aye kowaniib.” andoon.
Kwanandekore, ika yedmoon, “Kwane, yiib kuu awoya dana yewudmo yidwarok, yiib kuu okad korem muubnok. Okad yiri yidwarok.” andoon.
Weng kee Godbed Noa yoom ye karub dana yoom yaa yedmendoon,
“Kedi, kibikee nekambed ne weng kunduk eb yoom eb awoya ari dobaraniibdan yoom yaa kondaan kii.
Weng kunduk kee dingkaniib ayari oniib wadkeri yeman korem motod aombed angkadiriwen yaa kondaan.
Ne weng kunduk ke ongmaan kei, amaan ok urokbed wadkeri yeman korem ika monmarainban, kwane ok urokbed okad korem ika monmarainban.” andoon.
Kwanandekore, Godbed ika yedmoon, “Weng kunduk akmi yeman ke niinarikuru kei wiib wedaom kowaan, ne dore okad dore wedya kowaan kui. Weng kunduk akmi yeman kee kowaan kuu yiiwiib wadkeri yeman yenayiib korem yaa kowaan. Weng kunduk kuu nimakarub yaro dobere dobere yaro wananiib korem yiman.
<range>
Komo aron amokambidiib ongmaniine niinarikuruyiib keraneen kuu,
ne ika meenaniin ne weng kunduk yiib yoom dingkan maa maa korem yoom yaa kowaan kowe, angkon amaan ok urokbed wad doriibdan korem yainban andaniin.” andoon.|H
Ne kuu niinarikuru amukambiid ari wedmaniin kuu angkon ika meenaniin karuwiib dingkaniib yaa ne weng kunduk kowaan kuu.
Kukuu weng kunduk kuu wadkeri yeman yaa kondaan.” andoon.
Sem yoom Hem yoom Yeefet yoom kuu Noa ye karub dana. Yi kuu motod aombed angkadiriwen. (Hem kuu Keenan ye awodki.)
Karub dana ayoobmim kuyaambed karub korem yi awoya.
Noa kuu yongbon deme ye karub kowe nong yob ibduruk yembed andowe kiiboon.
Kiiboona demboona, nong yob wande ondoobkekore, angkimberene wain ok keroona, wain ok kuu anoon. Anekore, awarak ayuuna ebkad biandekore, idmo ye kombon aom angkeen.
Hem Keenan yawodki kumbed yawodki Noa kombon aom idmo angkeena wedmenoon. Wedmenekore, wene ye ambanga ayoob yaa yedmendoon.
Sem yoom Yeefet yoom tabua awine kankoone, yi kandom angkorom anuk kowe, kanwene yi angkorom korokbe weneniiwa kombon aom aomne yi awodki dabuneniwen. Yi murubia angkorom koniwen kuu yi awodki idmo angkeen kuu yi dowakenban wedmeni kuu.
Ok awarak dowan keroona, Hembed komo kamoon kuu Noambed wengamberekore,
yedmoon “Keenan yaa butun kamoon. Ye awoya kuu Hem ye ambanga ayoob yi awoya yi dabderem yirimo dobere yi dememo awine yaraniib.” andekore, ika yedmoon,
“Kubi konem, Sem ye Yariman God yaa. Keenan ye awoya kuu Sem ye awoya yi dabderem yiri dobere yi dememo awine yaraniib.” andekore, ika yedmoon,
“Godbed Yeefet ye okad kuu irin angkane darewoob kere. Kwane Sem yoom Yeefet yoom yi awoya kuu ibmo dobaraniib. Keenan ye awoya kuu Yeefet ye awoya yi dabderem yiri dobere yi dememo awine yaraniib.” andoon.
Urok yondem kuu Noa kuu weeb 350yiib doboroon.
Ye weeb korem kuu 950yiib doberene bobnoon.
Noa ye karub dana Sem, Hem, Yeefet urok kee ye yondem yi dana meed wanabiwen.
Yeefet ye karub dana kuu Gomer yoom Megog yoom Madai yoom Yavan yoom Tubal yoom Mesek yoom Tiras yoom kwane wanaboon. Kuyaambed ambibkin maa maa andowoon.
Gomer ye karub dana kuu Askenas yoom Rifat yoom Togarma yoom kwane wanaboon.
Yavan ye karub dana kuu Elisa yoom Taasis yoom Kit yoom Rodan yoom kwane wanaboon.
Keke Yeefet ye awoya ambibkin maa maa wenebe dobereniiwa weng maa maa dakmenabiwen. Yi kuu karamok dudbi ariyiib karamok kebed yayiib dobiriwen.
Hem ye karub dana kuu Kus yoom Misraim yoom Put yoom Keenan yoom kwane wanaboon. Kuyaambed ambibkin maa maa andowoon.
Kus ye karub dana kuu Seba yoom Havila yoom Sabta yoom Raama yoom Sabteka yoom kwane wanaboon. Raama ye karub dana kuu Seeba yoom Dedan yoom kwane wanaboon.
Nimrod kuu Kus ye mingki. Yembedmo nangmenmo wene okad yimin yimin yaa korok keroon.
Ye kuu dingkan yemoon bi ye karub keroon, Yariman God ye murubia ari. Kwanikob yikareb yedmimaib “Nimrod dingkan biman Yariman God ye murubia ari areb kerime.” andimaib.
Yembed Babilonia ambibkin aom taun Babiloniib Erekiib Akadiib Kalneyiib kuyaambed ibduruk korok keroon.
Ambibkin kuyaambed wene Asiria ambibkin aombed taun Ninevayiib Rehobotiiyiib Kalayiib
Reseniib yenbenaboon. Kambong Resen kuu Ninevayiib Kalayiib wedyirimbed yenbenaboon. Nineva taun kuu amaanbed darewoob kereen.
Misraim ye awoya kuu Ruddaniib Anamdaniib Lehabdaniib Naftudaniib
Patrusdaniib Kasludaniib Kaftordaniib. Kasludan yena andokbe yika dobereniib Filistiadan keriwen.
Keenan ye awoya kuu Saidondaniib Hitdaniib
Yebusdaniib Amorodaniib Girgasdaniib
Hivdaniib Arkdaniib Sindaniib
Arvaddaniib Semardaniib Hamatdaniib. Saidon kuu Keenan ye wonob dana. Kwane yi awoya wenebiwen.
Yi bid yimin kuu Saidonbed wene kuri kambong Kerar, kambong Kasa dia. Kwane wene kangka taun Sodomiib Gomorayiib Admayiib Seboyimiib, kambong Lasa dia.
Hem ye awoya kuu yi ambibkin maa maa yi amyenibon maa maa wenebe dobereniiwa yi weng maa maa dakmenabiwen.
Sem kuu Yeefet ye daman. Sem ye awoya maa kuu Hibrudan.
Sem ye karub dana kuu Elam yoom Asur yoom Arfasad yoom Lud yoom Aram yoom kwane wanaboon.
Aram ye karub dana kuu Us yoom Hul yoom Geter yoom Mesek yoom kwane wanaboon.
Arfasad ye mingki kuu Sela. Sela ye mingki kuu Eber. Eber ye awoya kuu Hibrudan.
Eber ye karub dana ari wanaboon kuu Peleg yoom Yoktan yoom kwane wanaboon. Peleg yaron yaa kuu ambibkin maa maa andokbe yemoon keroon.
Yoktan ye karub dana kuu Almodad yoom Selef yoom Hasarmavet yoom Yeraa yoom
Hadoram yoom Usal yoom Dikla yoom
Obal yoom Abimael yoom Seeba yoom
Ofir yoom Havila yoom Yobab yoom kwane wanaboon. Yi korem kuu Yoktan ye karub dana.
Yi dobiriwen kuu kambong Mesambed wene kambong Sefar kangka aangko ambibkin yaa.
Sem ye awoya kuu yi ambibkin maa maa yi amyenibon maa maa wenebe dobereniiwa yi weng maa maa dakmenabiwen.
Kuu Noa ye awoya kui. Kuyaambed urok yondem ambibkin korem yaa wenebe muubniwen.|U
Kurin anuk kuu nimakarub korem kuu weng mimo dakmimaib, yeka yeka andokbindo.
Kuyaron kuu yi korem aron dembimaun angka awanawanmo yaronib wene okad dabon yiri Babilonia aom dobiriwen.
Yi korem mene nedbenib yedmiwen, “Okadbed boyambib yeman ongmenabem. Ongmenabe aron nimin nongkobubko erebne kamkono kerok.” andiwen. Botban okadbed kwane ongmenabekoriwa, at nunung biwen, boyambib yeman dabokne awini yeman.
Kwamekoriwa yedmiwen, “Menebe boyambib yemoon taun keri dowad yenbenabem. Kwane, boyambib kongam darewoob yenbenmo daane ambid burudandem. Kwananuub kuu nub aningko kumbed darewoob keraneen. Nub aningkomo keruko okad yimin yimin yaa wenebe buyokbayok keraubban.” andiwen.
Kwanoona, Yariman kuu ambib kongamiib tauniib yenbiib kuu wedmok kamene
wedmekore yedmoon, “Yi weng mimo kumbed kwane andowe ongmiib kowe, komo meene ongmandamaniib kuu kwane ongmaniib.
Kwani kowe, nub kawenenub yi weng amonombe weng maa maa yeka yeka keroko neman wengambere wengambere kerindeban kerok.” andekore,
Yarimanbed been buyokbayok keroona bidambib maa maa wenebene boyambib taun darewoob yenbiib kuu korondiwen.
Kowe, taun yaningko kuu Babel ande yedmiwen, amborom kuu Yarimanbed nimakarub korem yi weng amonombe weng maa maa kere wene karub kuu ben buyokbayok kere okad yimin yimin yaa nongkobenmo wonoon.
Sem ye awoya kuu kei. Urok yondem weeb ayoob dowan keroona, Sem ye weeb 100iib kerekore ye mingki Arfasad kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Sem ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 500iib doboroon.
Arfasad kuu weeb 35iib doberekore ye mingki Sela kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Arfasad ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 403yiib doboroon.
Sela kuu weeb 30yiib doberekore ye mingki Eber kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Sela ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 403yiib doboroon.
Eber kuu weeb 34yiib doberekore ye mingki Peleg kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Eber ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 430iib doboroon.
Peleg kuu weeb 30yiib doberekore ye mingki Reu kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Peleg ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 209iib doboroon.
Reu kuu weeb 32yiib doberekore ye mingki Serug kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Reu ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 207iib doboroon.
Serug kuu weeb 30yiib doberekore ye mingki Nehor kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Serug ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 200iib doboroon.
Nehor kuu weeb 29iib doberekore ye mingki Tera kuu woonoon.
Kwanekore, Nehor ye dana yenayiib ari wanaboon. Kuyaom doboroon kuu weeb 119iib doboroon.
Tera kuu weeb 70yiib doberekore ye mingki Abram yoom Nehor yoom Haran yoom wanaboon.
Tera ye awoya kuu kei. Tera kuu Abram yoom Nehor yoom Haran yoom yi awodki. Haran kuu Lot yawodki.
Kwane Haran kuu ye taun Ur Babilonia ambibkin aombed bobnoon kuyaron kuu yawodki kuu doreen.
Abram kuu Serai awanoona Nehor kuu Milka awanoon. Haran kuu Milka yoom Iska yoom yi awodki.
Serai kuu kurong kowe yu dana kuu woonindo.
Kwane, Tera yaro ye mingki Abram yoom ye awo Lot yoom Abram ye wonong Serai yoom kuu bekore Ur taun yaa koronde Keenan ambibkin yaa wene wedya Haran taun yaambed doboroon.
Tera ye weeb korem kuu 205iib doberene bobnoon, Haran taun aom.|U (Weeb yemoon ari keruune, Noa ye dana mingki Sem ye awo aman ari Abram kuu wooneen.)
Kwane, Yarimanbed Abram yaa yedmenoon, “Ewambe yokadiib eb karubkimiib eb ambibkiniib domondekorewa, nembed ambibkin maa korokbebdaniin yaa wene.
Kwane, nembed eb awoya yemoon bangkabdaniina ambibkin yeweb kere yemoon kai keraniib. Kwane, amun kerubdaniin. Kwane, ongmaniina eb aningko kuu darewoob keraneen. Kwani kowe, eb yaambed yena kuu amun kerundaneen.
Kanembed eb yaa amun kerubdaneen kuu nembed amun kerunaniin, kuned kanembed arewa kerubdaneen kuu nembed arewa kerunaniin. Eb yaambed ambibkindan korem yaa kuu amun kerundaneen.” andoon.
Yarimanbed kwanandoone Abram wengamberekore kwanoon, ye kuu Haran taun angkambed Lot yoom domonde winiwen. Kuyaron kuu Abram ye weeb kuu 75iib.
Yembed ye wonong Serai yoom ye daman ye mingki Lot yoom kuu ye deme karuwiib ye yiribman korem Haran angkambed booniib kuu be Keenan ambibkin yaa wonoon. Kwane wene Keenan ambibkin nandene,
wene More ye at kubun keedbon kambong Sekem dia kwane kuyaa doboroon. (Kuyaron kuu Keenandan kuu kuyaa doriib.)
Doboroone, Yarimanbed wadbare angkaderene Abram yaa yedmenoon, “Ambibkin kee eb yob yaa kondaniin.” andoon. Kwanandoona, Abrambed bot wuuboon, Yarimanbed ne yaa angkadoroon kii ande korokbi yeman. (Abram yoom ye yoom winiwendan yoom kuu Keenan ambibkin aom dewinimaib, ye dingkan kab kuu kereek yemoon animaib kowe. Yi kuu ambib anam yenbenabindo, dingkan kadbed ongmiwen ye ambib kombon aombed dangimo kamen yariwen. Kwane, bidambib maa yaa wanande kaimaib kuu yi ambib kombon yeman kuu bedmenabe be kemo yi angkurom ari nongkobekorib bewinimaib.) (Yi kuu animan kab ma kibingkindo, dingkanmo bangkanandiwen. Yi dingkan yena kuu animaib, yena kuu ari berengkimaib, karub yena yi berengke yeen ani dowad. Kuye od kuu Abram ye nimakarub yoom kuu karub yena yaambed yongbon animan berengkimamiwen. Wiid yob kangkon berengkekorib flawa ongmenib bred nengkimamiwen.)|H
Amaan angkon koronde kuri wene aangkobon ambibkin angka angkanoon. Kambong Betel kaom kere kambong Ai kangka kere wedyiri kombon be arume doboroon. Kuyaambed angkon bot wuube dingkan nengke agedmo keroone baeb kuu Yariman God yaa koni yeman ye bon wuubekore, kurikuriyiib kubiyiib Yariman God yaa konoon.
Kwane, mim kuyaamo dobirindo, wene kuyaambed dobere dobere Keenan aom kuri doboroon.
Keenan ambibkin aom am kainoona animaniibban keroona mungimo dobereniiwa koronde anuk ambene wene Idyip ambibkin anuk wonoon.
Wene Idyipdan yi okad dia aomnande yedmoon ye wonong yaa “Kub kuu kerengkandimbon kowe,
Idyipdanbed meenaniib kuu kub kuu ne wonong ande meenenekoriwa, ne kuu nekoriwa, ub kuu nendaniib kowe,
minibka yedmende kub kuu ne daman ande. Kwane kub yaambed ne kuu nokban kere amun amun kamaniib.” andoon.
Andekore, Idyip bid aom aomnoona Idyipdan kuu ye wonong kuu wedmendiwen kuu kerengkandimbon wonong.
Kwane Idyip yi king Fero ye korok korok yena wedmendekoriwa, king yaa yedmeniiwa yembed yi yaa yedmendoone, wene Serai kuu nende king yambiwoom winiwen.
Yu dowadbed Abram kuu kingbed ongme oonenoon. Kwane, sibi yemooniib naningkod yemooniib buromakau yemooniib donki yemooniib kemo yemooniib kakmaniibban deme ye karub yemooniib bangkanoon, Abram yaa.
Serai nende yambiwoom kowoon ye dowadbed ye yoom yambiwoom karub doriib yoom yaa Yariman Godbed yi korem yaa korere darewoob maa maa kondoon.
Kwanoona, kingbed Abram yaa kaamonoon “Eb komo kamewen, ne yaa? Komoyiibkob Serai kuu ne wonong ande yedmewindo kerewen?
Komande yu kuu eb daman andekorewa, yu kuu munuunkob ne wonong keraan? Eb wonong kei nenwene keyom koronde yaro wene!” andekore,
king ye korok korok yaa yedmendoona Abram nendeniiwa ye wonong nendeniiwa ye barang korem bekoriwa ambibkin kuyom kuu be wene bunangka domondiiwe winiwen.
Abram yoom ye wonong yoom Lot yoom yi yiribman korem be Idyip ambibkin domonde ari wene Keenan ambibkin yaa winiwen.
Abram kuu yiribman yemoon ye karub, sibiyiib naningkodiib buromakauiib od yeman silva yemooniib gold yemooniib boon.
Kwane angkon dobere dobere wene Betel kere Ai kere anukbed kombon be doboroon yaa ika monoon.
Menekore, bot wuube dingkan nengke agedmo keroone baeb kuu Yariman God yaa koni yeman ye bon wuubekore, kurikuriyiib kubiyiib God yaa konoon.|U
Lot, ye kuu Abram yoom winiwenman, ye kangkon ye nimadanayiib deme karuwiib sibiyiib naningkodiib buromakauwiib.
Abram ye dingkan kawiib Lot ye dingkan kawiib kuu yemoon keroon kowe, kereek kirod dowan keroona yi ayoob ibmo dobiri yiminban keroon.
Kwane, Abram ye dingkan kab oonidaniib Lot ye dingkan kab oonidaniib arud weng dakmiwen. (Kuyaron kuu Keenandaniib Perisdaniib Keenan ambibkin aom doriib.)
Kwani kowe, Abrambed Lot yaa yedmoon, “Eb kuu ne daman kowe nub kuu wengbaraub, nub deme karub kangkon wengbaraib.
Okad kumundin kemaombed nub dewenebi kuu yiminaa. Kwani kowe, nub kibikee andokbem. Eb dowaken an angka wene dobarande meenewen kuyaa wenebko, ne kuu wiwi angka wene dobarako. Eb dowaken wiwi angka wene dobarande meenewen kuyaa wenebko, ne kuu an angka wene dobarako.” andoon.
Kwane, Lot kuu indob kankoone darobe wedmoon kuu kankubunen yiri yaningko Yoodenbed wene kambong Soar yimin ok yemoon wedmoon, kukuu Yariman ye yongbon Iden areb Idyip okad areb. (Kuyaron kuu God kuu Sodom tauniib Gomora tauniib monmarindo.)
Kwane kuyaambed, Abram yoom Lot yoom kwane andokbiiwe, Lot kuu Yooden kankubunen yiri kangka angkanoon.
Kwane, Abram kuu Keenan bid ari doboroona, Lot kuu wene Sodom taun dia kankubunen yiri doboroon.
Sodomdan kuu Yariman ye murubia ari miin arewa kame ambarakmi darewoob kamembirimaib.
Lot wonoona kuye yoman Yarimanbed Abram yaa yedmenoon, “Ebbed doreeb kuyaambed indob kankoone kangka kere kaom kere kuri kere kari kere okad korem ongme wedme.
Okad korem ke wedmeeb kee eb yoom eb yob yoom yaa kondaniin, aron korem.
Nembed eb yob yemoon bangkabdaniin kuu karub ma kimingke dorinban, ingkud korem kimingkindeban areb.
Keenan okad korem kee eb yaa kabdaniin kowe, wene okad korem kee yimin yimin yaa dewene dore wedme.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Abrambed Hebron aom wene Mamre ye at kubun keedbon dia wene kombon yenbe doboroon. Kwane, Yariman yaa meeni yeman ye bon botbed wuuboon.|H
Sodom taun yi king kuu Bera. Gomora taun yi king kuu Birsa. Kambong Adma yi king kuu Sinab. Kambong Seboim yi king kuu Semeber. Yi kaningiib yoom Soar yi king yoom, yi korok kuu Kedolaomer. Yembed oonoon kuu weeb wad ayoowiib dowan kereen kumban yikareb kerem ande meeniwen, yi king angkoyiib kuu. Kedolaomer kuu Elam ambibkindan yi king. Amrafel kuu Babilonia ambibkindan yi king. Ariok kuu Elasar ambibkindan yi king. Tidal kuu Goim ambibkindan yi king. Yi kaningiib yi ana nangmidaniib taun angkoyiib yi king yaa nangmok winiwen. Kambong angkoyiib yi ana nangmidaniib yi kingiib kankubunen yiri yaningko Sidim yaa nedbiwen. (Kibikee Sidim kuu karamok yaningko Ded Si.)
<range>
<range>
<range>
Weeb 14iib ari kuu Kedolaomer yoom ye king angkodmi yoom yi ana nangmidan yoom kambong Asterot Karnaim yaa wene Refaim karub yaa nangmene, kambong Hem yaa wene Sus karub yaa nangmene, kambong Save Kiriataim yaa wene Em karub yaa nangmene, aangko Seir ambibkin aom wene Hor karub yaa nangmene, kambong Elparan dia nangmeniwen. Kwanekoriwa, Kedolaomer yoom ye king angkodmi yoom yi korok keriwen. Kambong Elparan kuu amiibban koknoon ambibkin dia.
<range>
Kwanekoriwa, amonombe kambong Kades yaa wene Amelek karub korem yaa wene nangmene Amoro karub yaa kambong Hasason Tamar aom wene nangmeniwen. Kwanekoriwa, Kedolaomer yoom ye king angkodmi yoom yi korok keriwen.|U
Aron maa, Sodoma Gomoraya Admaya Seboima Soara yi ana nangmidaniib yi kingiib kankubunen yiri yaningko Sidim yaa nangmok winiwen.
Yi kuu Elamdan yi king Kedolaomer yoom Goimdan yi king Tidal yoom Babiloniadan yi king Amrafel yoom Elasardan yi king Ariok yoom yi ana nangmidaniib yaa nangmok winiwen. King angkoyiibbed king kaningiib yaa nangmok winiwen kui.
Kankubunen yiri yaningko Sidim kuu kolta bot dem yemoon dangoon. Nangmenib, Sodom yi ana nangmidan yoom Gomora yi ana nangmidan yoom yi king ayoob yoom kuu kirikmone wenenib dem yiri kirobiiwe, king yenayiib yi ana nangmidaniib kuu kirikmone wene aangko ari daaniwen.
Kedolaomer yoom ye king angkodmi ayoobmimiib yoom yi ana nangmidan yoombed Sodoma Gomoraya yi yiribmaniib yi animaniib korem kuu be winiwen.
Abram ye daman ye mingki Lot kuu Sodom aom doreen kowe, ana nangmidanbed yeyiib ye yiribmaniib kangkon be winiwen.
Karub mamaa kombere dore wenene komo keroon kuu Abram yaa daanoon. (Abram yaa kuu “Hibruman” andimaib. Ye kuu Mamre ye at kubun keedbon dia doboroon. Mamre yoom ye damana Eskol yoom Aner yoom yi ayoobmim kuu Amorodan. Yi kuu Abram yangkodmi.)
Abram wengamboroone ye mingki Lot kuu bondanbed nenwiniwen kowe, ye nangmi karub korem 318iib benwene king kaningiib yaa nangmok wenene kambong Dan yaa nandekore,
amnoombed Abram kuu ye karub andokboone, wene nangmiiwa kirikmoniiwa nangmenmo wene kambong Hoba dia winiwen. Hoba kuu Damaskus taun burudande ari.
Kwane, Abram kuu benwiniwen ye yiribman koremiib Lotiib ye yiribmaniib Sodoma Gomoraya ye nimayiib nimakarub yenayiib be ika monoon.
Abram kuu Kedolaomer awene yaa nangme burudande dorekore ika monoona, Sodom yi kingbed Abramiib yaa wedmenok wonoon, kankubunen yaningko Save yiri.
Kuyaron kuu Melkisedek kuu kambong Salem yi kingiib Korem Ari ye God dore karub dore wedyiri dobiri ye karuwiib. Kwane, yembed flawayiib nongyob ok ambodiib Abramiib yaa be menene,
Abram amun kerunok ande yedmoon, “Korem Burudandoon Arimbed Ye God, ambidiib okadiib ongmenaboonman, Abram yaa amun kerunok.
Yembed awabdoone nangmeneb burudandewen kowe, Korem Burudandoon Arimbed Ye God yaningko kankoonem.” andoon. Kwanandoone, Abrambed nangmene boon ye yiribman kuu andokbe wenore angko angkoyiib nongkobekore anded mimo kuu Melkisedek yaa konoon.|H
Konoone, Sodom yi kingbed Abram yaa yedmoon “Nangmenib biwen yiribman kuu awine, kumban ne nimakarub kuu ika bangkawe.” andoon.
Andoone, Abrambed man yedmoon “Korem Ari ye Yariman Godbed yedmoonkob okadiib ambidiib kereen. Yaningko yaambed yedmaan kuu
eb yiribman kuu ma awinainban. Korem ebka bangkabdandamiin, ebkad nong o yonkad nong awinainban. Kwani kowe, ebbed kekane yedmaabban ‘Abram kuu nembed yiribman yemoon bangkanaan kowe, ye kuu yiribman yemoon ye karub keroon.’ andaabban.
Ne kuu eb yiribman ma kandainban, kuned ne karubkimbed ani yeman aniwen kumbedmo awinaniin. Ne angkodmia Mamre yoom Eskol yoom Aner yoom yimbedmo yi nangmenib biwen yiribman kuu bime.” andoon.|U
Kwane, amaan Yarimanbed Abram yaa wane korokbene yedmenoon, “Abram, eb unaab. Arud ye barang yaa kuu kombe areb kukbebdembaraniin. Ne kuu eb kakman amun miin darewoob keraan.” andoon.
Kumban, Abrambed yedmoon, “O Yariman Ambengkan, ne kuu danayiibban kowe, ne yaa kakman kuu komo kawaneeb? Ne yumbon kandaneen ye karub kuu ne deme karub Elieser, Damaskus ye karub kii.” andoon.
Kwanandekore Abrambed ika yedmoon, “Ebbed ne yaa danayiib kawindo kowe, ne deme karub yembed ne yumboniib yiribmaniib kuu baneen.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Yarimanbed yedmenoon, “Eb deme karub kuu eb yumboniib yiribmaniib baanban. Eb bobnaneeb kuu eb dana mingki eb umkan anam kumbed eb yumboniib yiribmaniib kuu baneen.” andoon.
Kwanandekore, Abram nenwene bunangkambed yedmenoon, “Eb indob kankoone ambid ari wedme, mindong kimingke. Ebkareb kimingki kuu yiminoo? Eb awoya kuu mindong yemoon kwamune areb keraniib kii.” andoon.
Abram kuu Yariman ye weng yaa anam ande meenoonkob, Yarimanbed ye dowad meenoon kuu “Ye kuu yorokmo ye karub ande kowaan kii.” andoon.
Kwanandekore, yembed Abram yaa yedmoon, “Ne kuu Yariman, Ur taun Babilonia ambibkin aombed nenyaro manaan ye id kuu okad kee eb yaa kabdandid.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Abrambed kaamonoon, “O Yariman Ambengkan, komarewa kerenidned okad kuu neman keraneen kuu nekaadkeraniin?” andoon.
Andoone, Yarimanbed yedmenoon, “Buromakau ingkod mimoyiib naningkod mimoyiib sibi ambi mimoyiib, yi korem kuu weeb ayoobmim dowan kereen kumbed, ayari on kawanmo mimo yaningko daviib ayari on kerekerek ingkod mimo yaningko pidyoniib kuu be mene.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Abram kuu kuye dingkan yeene be monoon. Be mene, dingkan kuu wedyirimbed bunge baangkane angkara angkara nongkobekore, on kuu bunge baangkindo on maa angkara kowe on maa angkara kowoon, kiwaan wedyiri angkuun.
Bob id animaib ye ayari on kumbed wanmene dingkan yom kuu anandamiiwa Abrambed wangmoon.
Aron kuu kubune wenuune, Abram kuu unuk darewoob angkoone, kumun darewoob kebenenuune, uniwon karakwon keroon.
Kwane, Yarimanbed Abram yaa yedmoon, “Weng keyaa anam ande. Eb awoya ari kuu wene ambibkin mamaa yaa dobaraniiwe kuye ambibkindanbed yi ben kakmaniibban no deme awinembiridan kerundenib miin arewa kamendaniib, kwane dobaraniibbed wene weeb 400iib dowan keranuun.
Kumban, kwamendaniib ye kakman kuu nembed kuye ambibkindan yaa wengyundeni dabab kondaniin. Kwananiina, eb awoya ari kuu yiribman yemoon ben ambibkin yaro angkane wananiib.
Kumban eb kuu keyaa yewenubmo dobere wene kiomne anam kerekoreb bobnaneewe mangkaniib.
Eb awoya awoya kaningiib keraniib yaron yaa kuu ika mananiib. Kuyaron kuu Amoro ambibkindan yi dobiri arewa kuu darewoob keraneena dabab darewoob kondaniin kuyaambed eb awoya ari ika mananiib.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, aron kuu kubune miriknoone, flawa nengki yeman amarengiib angkadkok amot yumbuyiib angkadere dingkan yom dangoone wedyirimbed dewonoone,
Yarimanbed Abram yaa amob weng yedme kowoon, “Okad keembed kuri wene Idyip okad yimin, kari wene ok Yufretes yimin, eb awoya ari yaa kondaniin.” andoon.|H
Okad kee Ken ambibkiniib Kenis ambibkiniib Kadmon ambibkiniib
Hit ambibkiniib Peris ambibkiniib kambong Refaimiib
Amoro ambibkiniib Keenan ambibkiniib Kirgas ambibkiniib Yebus ambibkiniib kukui.” andoon.|U
Abram ye wonong Serai kuu kurong kowe, yu deme no awinembiri ye Idyip wonong yu aningko Hagar konandameen kuu meeneen.
Kwana kowe, Abram yaa yedmeen, “Yarimanbed ne dana nendi kiwaan kebenoon kowe, ne dowaken kuu ne deme no awinembiri ye wonong yoom dangime. Dana woonanuun kuu ne danayiib kera.” andeen. Seraimbed kwananduune Abrambed “Ee” andoon.
Kwana kowe, yumbed yu ambi Abram yaa Hagar konuune awanoon. Kuyaron kuu Abram awene kuu Keenan ambibkin aom weeb angko angkoyiib dobiriwen.|H
Awanoona, Hagar kuu oyoomiib kereen. Oyoomiib keruune wedmekoru, kerengkan inamen kameenu Serai yaa karak kondeen.
Kwamune kowe, Seraimbed Abram yaa yedmeen “Hagarbed ne yaa karak kaween kuu ebbed ongmi yeman kii. Anam, nembed eb yaa kabdaan kumban oyoomiib kerekoru, ne yaa karak bangkawimamuun, kowe Yariman Godbed wengyundandok eb dee ne dee!” andeen.
Anduune, Abrambed yedmoon “Eyoka, yu kuu kub deme ye kakmaniibban wonong kereene, ub kuu yu korok kowe, kubbed yu yaa komo kamaneeb kuu kub dowakenmo.” andoon. Seraimbed Hagar yaa wenbanduune koronde wuneen.
Yariman God ye engyumbed wene Hagar yaa amiibban koknoon ambibkin aom kambong Sur ye kiwaan ari kirub okdobon yaa wengandene
yedmoon “Hagar, Serai yu deme ye kakmaniibban wonong, kuna yaambed menebko, kuna yaa weneeb?” andoone, man yedmeen “Ne kuu ne korok yaambed kombere dore meniin.” anduune,
yembed yedmoon “Angkon ika wene, yu deme ye kakmaniibban wonong ika kere.
Nembed kub awoya yemoon bangkabdaniin kuu karub kane ma kimingkaanban.” andekore,
angkon ika amun kerune yedmoon “Kub kuu karub dana woonaneeb kuu yaningko Ismael andaneeb, amborom kuu Yariman Godbed kub ameng kami kuu wengamboroon.
Kumban, kub karub dana kuu awon kiib areb dobaraneen. Ye kuu karub korem yaa bon keraneene karub korem kwangkon ye yaa bon kerunaniib. Ye karubkim yaa domonde yekamo dobaraneen.” andoon.
Andoone, Hagar kuu God anam wedmenaan manok andeen. Kowe, Yariman God yaa yaningko baandeen “Wedmewewen ye God.” amborom kuu Godbed yu yaa daandoon kowe.
Kwanikob, okdobon yaningko kuu Beyalahairoi andimamiib. Okdobon kuu kambong Kades dore kambong Bered dore wedyiri angkuun.|U
Amaan, Hagar kuu karub dana wooneene Abrambed dana yaningko Ismael andoon.|H
Kuyaron kuu Abram ye weeb kuu 86iib.|U
Abram ye weeb kuu 99iib keroone, Yarimanbed angkaderene yedmenoon, “Ne kuu Aromkono Darewoob Arimbed Ye God kowe, ne dowaken yaambed dobereneb eb yaa ambarakmoon kii ande kadwoniyiibban dobere.
Nembed eb yaa amob weng yedme kowaan kuu kwananiin. Kwane, eb awoya yemoon kai bangkabdaniin.” andoon.
Abram ye korok kankibene ye kiringkonombed okad badmendoone, Godbed ye yaa yedmenoon,
“Kedi, nembed kekane kamaniin kei. Ne amob weng yedme kowaan kuu kei, eb kuu ambibkin yemoon ye ambokab keraneeb kii.
Kibireb kei eb aningko Abram korondaan, kumban aningko yeeb Abraham kabdaan, amborom kuu ambibkin yemoon ye ambokab keraneeb kowe.
Eb awoya yemoon bangkabdaniin. Eb awoya kuu yemoon kerenib andokbe ambibkin yena keraniib. Eb awoya yena kuu king keraniib.
Amob weng kee aron korem eb yoom eb awoya yoom yaa angkimberembaraneen kuu ne kuu eb God angkon ne kuu eb awoya yi God.
Kibikee Keenan ambibkin okad kee eb okadban, kumban okad korem kuu eb awoya yaa kondaniine yiman keranuun, aron korem. Angkon, ne kuu yi God keraniin.” andoon.
Godbed kwanandekore, Abraham yaa ika yedmoon, “Amob weng yedme kowaan kuu korobe awinime, eb yoom eb awoya ari yoom, yi yaro dobere dobere yaro wananiib aom kuu.
Eb yoom eb awoya ari yoom yaa amob weng yedme kowaan kuu kei, karub dana korem kuu wekonokad wadmenabime.
Kad wadmi kuu eb dore ne dore amob weng yedme kowaan ye akmi yeman.
Karub dana woonibka aron kaning kaningiib dowan keruko yi korem yi kad wadmenabime. Eb dana anam yoom, eb demedan yi dana yoom, owoddan yaambed deme no awinembiri ye dowad odbed moonaneeb ye dana yoom, eb dana anamban kui, yi kad wadmenabime. Kad wadmi ye amob weng kuu aron korem korem ye amob.
<range>
Karub kanembed kad wadmindo kuu nembed yedme kowaan ye amob weng domokboon kowe, ye kuu dankarime.” andoon.
Andekore, angkon ika yedmoon “Eb wonong yu aningko Serai kuu koronde, kumban aningko yeeb Sera ande.
Yu yaa amun kerundaniin, angkon eb yaa yu yaambed dana mingki kabdaniine, yu kuu ambibkin yemoon yi awoya keranuun. Angkon, yu awoya yena kuu king keraniib.” andoon.
Andoone, Abraham ye korok kankibene ye kiringkonombed okad badmendene meendobekore ambon kamoon. Ye meeni kuu “Karub weeb 100iib kuu danayiib keraneen dee? Sera weeb 90yiib kuu dana woonanuun dee?” ande meenekore ika demboon.
Dembekore, God yaa kaamonenoon “Ismael kuu ne yumbon kandaneen kuu yimin dee?” andoon.
Andoone, Godbed Abraham yaa yedmoon “Yii. Eb wonong Sera kuu karub dana woonanuun kuu yaningko Aisek ande. Ne weng kunduk kee ye yoom ye awoya yoom yaa kondaniin.
Eb dowaken Ismael yaa wengamberekoreb, ye yaa amun kerunaniine dana yemoon keraneene, king wad ayoowiib yi awodki keraneen. Ye awoya yaa kuu ambibkin aromkonoyiib kerunaniin.
Kumban ne weng kunduk kuu Aisek yaamo konaniin. Ye kuu Serambed woonanuun weeb mimo dowan keranuun ari.” andoon.
Dakme dowan kerekore, Godbed Abram domonene kawonoon.
Kuyaron kwarimbed Abraham kuu God ye weng wengamberekore, ye dana mingki Ismaeliib ye deme ye kakmaniibban ye karuwiib karub yambiwoom doriiwiib korem kuu kad wadmenabiwen.
Abraham ye weeb kuu 99iib dowan keruunkob kad wandiwen.
Angkon, Ismael kwangkon ye weeb 13iib dowan keruunkob kad wandiwen.
Aron mimo arimbed yi ayoowiib ye deme karub koremiib kuu kad wadmenabiwen.
<range>
Kuyaron kuu Abraham kuu Mamre ye at kubun keedbon dia ambib kombon yenbe doboroon. Kwane, aronkobbed Abraham kuu ye ambib kombon kiwaan ari diboroone Yarimanbed mene angkadoroon.
Kwane, Abrahambed wedmoone karub ayoobmim kuu doriib. Wedmendekore, kirodmo wene wengandande wonoon. Wenene, ye korok kankibene ye kiringkonombed okad badmendene
yedmoon, “Ne yariman, eb dememan ne yaa dowakeniib kerebko, nambib yaa mene burudandaab.
Yiib kuu ee andibka ok yunmonoko yiib yon ogekorib at kubun keyaom dibere yiidkime.
Ne angkon animaniib kanmanako, ane aromkono kandekoriwa yiib dowakenmo winime. Yiib dememan neyiib yaa miniwen kowe.” andoon. Andoone, yimbed inande yedmiwen, “Eyoka, eb weng dakmewen kuu kwamune kame.” andiwen.
Andiiwe, Abraham kuu kirodmo wene ambib kombon aom Sera yaa yedmendoon, “Kirod, flawa yemoon nengke.” andoon.
Kwanandekore, ye kirodmo dingkan doriib yaa wene buromakau mana kowiib kanmene kowoone ye deme karubbed kirod ayekore bunge nengkoon.
Kwane, Abrahambed naningkod muk ambod kodkobmo kerooniib naningkod muk ambodiib buromakau yomiib be karub ayoobmim yaa wene at kubun dem aombed nekwekore doboroone yi ayoobmim aniwen.
Anekoriwa, yimbed Abraham yaa kaamoneniwen, “Eb wonong Sera gude?” andiwen. Kwanandiiwe, yembed yedmoon, “Yu kuu ambib kombon aom yakui.” andoon.
Yi ayoobmim ye karub maambed yedmoon, “Anam kuu wood wad ayoowiib ari kuu angkon ika mananiine eb wonong Sera kuu dana mingki woonanuun.” andoon. Sera kuu ambib kombon ye ambongko diambed wengambureen.
(Abraham yoom Sera yoom kuu kiomniwen kowe Sera yu dana nendi kuu yiminban.)
Kowe, Sera kuu yemyeb ambon kamenu yukareb yedmeen, “Dana nendi kuu kubi yeman kuned, ne kad kombaraan angkon ne korok kuu kiomnoon kowe, kwane kubaniinoo? Dowan.” andeen.
Kwananduune, Yarimanbed Abraham yaa yedmenoon, “Sera kuu komo andud ambon kamenu ‘Kiomnaan kuned dana nendaniinoo?’ andeen?
Nembed komo kamandamiin kuu kwananiin. Nembed yedmaan kuu wood wad ayoowiib dowan keranuune angkon ika mananiine Sera kuu dana mingki woonanuun.” andoon.
Sera kuu uneen kowe dude yedmeen, “Ne ambon kamindo.” andeen. Anduune, Godbed man yedmoon, “Yii, anam kuu ambon kamewen.” andoon.
Kwaniiwe, karub ayoobmim kuu yaro dembenib Sodom taun yiri andowe winiwen. Kwane, Abraham kuu yi domondok wonoone,
Yarimanbed yedmoon, “Komo kamandamiin kuu Abraham yaa kuu biknenainban.
Ye awoya kuu ambibkin aromkono darewoob keraniib. Angkon, Abraham yaambed ambibkin korem kuu amun kerundaniin.
Ye kuu nembed kinaan kowe, yembed ye danayayiib ye awoyayiib yaa ne weng daandaneene wengamberekorib, inamen yorokmoyiib inamen yiminmoiib kamaniib. Kwamaniib kuu ye yaa ne weng kunduk yedmaan kuu kamaniin.” andoon.
Kwanandekore, Yarimanbed Abraham yaa yedmoon, “Wengambaraan kuu Sodomiib Gomorayiib yi inamen kuu miin arewa kai, kwane yi ambarakmi kuu miin darewoob kai kowe,
nembed yiri wene weng kee anam dee anamban dee kuyaa wedmandamiin.” andoon.
Andoone, karub ayoob Sodom yaa winiiwe, Abraham kuu Yariman ye arinambo doboroon.
Abrahambed ye yaa yaro menene kaamonoon, “Ebbed arewa kamenabidan monmaraneeb kuu yorokmodan kangkon monmaraneewoo?
Siti aom kuu yorokmodan 50iib keraneen kuu arewadaniib korem kuu monmaraneeb dee? Yorokmodan 50iib dobaraniib kuu taun domondaneeb dee yorokmodaniib arewadaniib ibmo monmaraneeb dee?
Eb kuu okaddan korem ye Wengyundi Ye Karub kowe, yorokmo wengyundaneeb dee? Anamaa, ebbed ma kamaabban. Ebbed yorokmodaniib arewadaniib yaa ibmo wengyundande ukum mimo kondaabban, yorokmodaniib arewadaniib ben dabokne yenbandaawe duknaibban.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Yarimanbed yedmoon, “Yorokmodan 50iib Sodom aom wedmaniin kuu taun kuu monmarainban.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Abrahambed God yaa inande yedmoon, “Ne kanangkod dakmaan kumban eb kuu Yariman, ne kuu karubmo, ingkud o yikbot areb.
Ma, yorokmodan 50iibban 45iibmo dobaraniib kuu komo kamaneeb? Karub angkoyiib kuyiibban kumbed taun kumundin monmaraneeb dee?” andoon. Kwanandoone, Godbed yedmoon, “Yorokmodan 45iib dobaraniiwe wedmaniin kuu monmarainban.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Abrahambed ika yedmoon, “Yorokmodan 40iib dobaraniib kuu komo kamaneeb?” andoone, Godbed yedmoon, “40iib dobaraniiwe wedmaniin kuu monmarainban.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Abrahambed God yaa yedmoon, “Yariman, ne yaa kongewaab, angkon ika dakmandamiin. Yorokmodan 30iibmo dobaraniib kuu komo kamaneeb?” andoone, Godbed yedmoon, “30iib dobaraniiwe wedmaniin kuu monmarainban.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Abrahambed yedmoon, “Eb kuu Yariman kumban, eb yaa kanangkod dakmaan kuu amunban. Kumban, yorokmodan 20iibmo dobaraniib kuu komo kamaneeb?” andoone, Godbed yedmoon “20iib dobaraniiwe wedmaniin kuu monmarainban.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Abrahambed yedmoon, “Yariman, ne yaa kongewaab, angkon ika mimo dakmaniin kuu yimin dee? Yorokmodan angko angkoyiibmo dobaraniib kuu komo kamaneeb?” andoone, Godbed yedmoon, “Angko angkoyiib dobaraniiwe wedmaniin kuu taun kuu monmarainban.” andoon.
Kwanandekore, Yariman kuu Abraham domonene wonoone Abraham kuu koronde ambiwoom ika wonoon.
Kuye oobnembed Lot kuu taun ye kuuk botbed wiriniwen yambongko yaambed diboroon. Kwane, engyus ayoob kee mene Sodom yaa miniiwe, Lotbed wedmendekore yaro wene ye korok kankibene ika dembe
yedmoon, “Ne korok korok ee! Ne kuu yiib yaa angkodmandamiin kowe nambiwoom minime. Yiib yon ogibko angkekoruwa, awari amkimombed wananiib kuu yimin.” andoon. Kwanandoone, yimbed yedmiwen, “Yii, taun kidangkambed amnoom kuu dobaranuuwe waraneen.” andiwen.
Kwanandiiwe, Lotbed daande nangkandoone “Ee” andekoriwa, yambiwoom winiiwe, Lotbed ye deme karub yedmoone kabayingkindo ye flawayiib orok animaniib nengkiiwe nekwoone aniwen.
Anekoriwa, amnoombed owoddan kuu dibiiwe, Sodom ye karub aamkonoyiib kewediib korem kuu mene yambib angkara awanewandiwen.
Kwane, yimbed Lot yaa baande yedmiwen, “Karub kibik eb yoom doberem ande miniwen kuu kuna? Nub yaa benmenebko yi yaa nenem kamendem.” andiwen.
Kwanandiiwe, Lotbed bunangka wene ambongko kebenekore
yedmoon, “Nangkodmia! Mokorondime, yiib kuu arewa kamendaib!
Ne dana koyu ayoob kuu karub yoom dangindo kumbed yiib yaa be mene domondaniine komo kamaniib kuu yiib dowakenmo. Kumban owoddan ayoob keyaa arewa kamendaib! Yi kuu nambiwoom miniwen kowe, nembed yi kukbaraniin.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Sodomdanbed yedmiwen, “Angkane! Eb kuu nub ambibkinmanban kumban, eb kuu nub wengyundi korok kerandameewoo? Yiminban kii! Angkane! Angkanokban kuu yi ayoob yaa kuu arewa kerundanuub kuu burudande eb yaa kuu arewa darewoob arimbed kerubdanuub.” andiwen. Andekoriwa, Lot dedmonenib ambongko monmarande kamiwen.
Kumban owoddan ayoobbed bunangka yire Lot kuu angkon ika ambiwoom kirodmo binge wande nen aomnekorib, ambongko kuu kebeniwen.
Kwane, yimbed karub korem ambib bunangka doriib yi indob kuu kebengkiiwe, indob tut keroone, yi korem ambongko wedmindeban keriwen.
Kwanekoriwa, owoddan ayoobbed Lot yaa yedmiwen, “Eb kuu eb danayiib eb wonongkimiib eb karubkimiib taun keyaom doriib kee ben angkane,
amborom kuu taun kee monmarandamuub kowe. Yariman ye kiringkono arimbed ambarakmi yemoon keriwen kowe, yembed Sodom monmari dowad nub ben yuroone munuwen.” andiwen.
Kwanandiiwe, Lot kuu wenene ye dana koyu ayoob awadmandamiib ye karub ayoob yaa yedmendoon, “Kirod minibko wenem, Yarimanbed taun kee monmarandameen kowe!” andoon, kumban ye kuu birondok monoon manok ande meeniwen.
Warandameen yaambed, engyus ayoobbed Lot yaa yedmiwen, “Kirod! Eb wonong yoom eb dana koyu ayoob ke doriib kee yoom be angkane. Kirod angkanokban keraneeb kuu taun kee monmaranuuwe yiib kangkon duknaniib.” andiwen.
Kwanandiiwe, kerebkarab kamoon kumban, Yarimanbed mimyob keenoon kowe, engyus ayoobbed ye yoom ye wonong yoom ye dana koyu ayoob yoom kuu taun bunangka be winiwen.
Winiiwe, engyu ayoob ye karub maambed yedmoon, “Bobnaub ande kabaanmo winime! Ika anuk wedmaib! Kankubunen yiri wene yinmonaib! Kabaanmo wene aangko daanime! Kwamunaniib kuu duknaibban.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, Lotbed yedmoon, “Ne korok, kwamunaabned, nub kuu yiminban ii!
Ebbed ne yaa dowakeniib keruwoon, kwane ne yaa amun kai kamewen kowe bobnainban. Kumban kombiri wene aangko daani kuu ne kuu yiminban kowe, neyiib monmaraneewe bobnaniin.
Kedi, kambong meb yaa kuu wedmeewoo? Kambong kuu dia kowe kombiri wananiin kuu yimin dee? Kambong kuu embengaa. Kukuu embengoo? Kambong embeng yaa wananiin kuu yimin andaneeb kuu bobnainban.” andoon.
Kwanandoone, engyumbed yedmoon, “Ee, eweng kuu wengambaraan. Kambong ke dakmewen kee monmarainban.
Kowe, kirod kabaanmo wene! Ma kamainban, eb kuu wene yakuyaa nandaneeb kumbed.” andoon. Lotbed kambong kuu embeng andoon kowe yaningko kuu Soar andimaib.
Aron kuu yaro menuune Lot kuu wene kambong Soar yaa wene nandoone,
Yarimanbed yedmoone ambid arimbed bot sulfa amotiib taun Sodomiib Gomorayiib ari kirobeen.
Kwane, kankubunen yiriyiib nimakarub koremiib aya nonga buuk koremiib kuu monmaroon.
Kumban, Lot ye wonong kuu ika anuk wedmuune yu kuu karam kere at kongkab areb kereen.
Mirikne ware amkimo keruune, Abraham kuu uniyambed Yariman ye arinambo ari doboroon kuu ika wonoon.
Ye wene doberene Sodomiib Gomorayiib kankubunen yiriyiib yaa wedmoone, ambib yemoon amot denemoon yi amareng darewoob yeederebeen.
Godbed Abraham yoom dakmiwen ye weng kuu nonondandindo kowe, Lot yaa awanenoone taun monmaroon kuu kombiri wonoon.|H
Lot kuu kambong embeng aom dobiri kuu unoon kowe, ye yoom ye dana koyu ayoob yoom kuu koronde wene aangko daane aangko dem aombed dobiriwen.
Angkaanbed nengkaan yaa yedmendeen “Nub ambe kuu kiomnoon. Angkon, nub yaa awani ye dowad kuu karuwiibban kowe, danayiib keraubban kii.
Awarak ayi yeman ye ok yaningko wain konubko anekore awarak ayuko ye yoom dangenub danayiib kerem.” andeen.
Anduune, amnoombed wain ok koniiwe anoone awarak ayuune angkaan yoom dangiwen. Awarakbed ayeen kowe komo kamoon kuu yekaadban.
Awarimbed angkaanbed nengkaan yaa yedmeen “Ne yoom danguwen kowe, amnoom kuu angkon ika wain ok konubko anoko awarak ayuko kub yoom dangime. Nub ayoob kuu nub ambe yaambed danayiib kerem.” andeen.
Anduune, amnoombed wain ok koniiwe anoone awarak ayuune nengkaan yoom dangiwen. Awarakbed ayeen kowe komo kamoon kuu yekaadban.
Kwanekoriwa, yi awodki yaambed oyoomiib keriwen.
Angkaan kuu dana mingki woonekoru, yaningko Moab andeen. Moab kuu Moab ambibkin yi awoya.
Nengkaan kuu dana mingki woonekoru, yaningko Benami andeen. Benami kuu Amon ambibkin yi awoya.
Abrahambed Mamre ye okad yaa kuu domonde kuri wene Keenan ambibkin aom kambong Kades dore kambong Sur dore wedyiri doboroon. Amaan, kambong Gerar aom wene doberene
yedmoon “Sera kuu ne daman.” andimaan. Kwanoone, Gerar ye king ye aningko Abimelekbed ye deme karub yaa yedmoone, Sera kuu ye yaa nenwiniwen.
Amnoom mamaambed kiyuum angkambed Godbed wene Abimelek yaa yedmenoon “Wonong kee awaneenbed nenminiwen kowe, bobnandameeb kii.” andoon.
Kumban Abimelek kuu ayoob dangindo kowe, Yariman God yaa yedmoon “Ne ambarakmindo kowe, neyiib ne nimakarub koremiib monmaraneebdee?
Abraham yembed ne daman andoone angkon yu kangkon yembed yedmoon areb yedmeen kowe, inamen amunmo kere nendaan kowe, ne ambarakmindo.” andoon.
Godbed kiyuum angkambed Abimelek yaa yedmoon “Ee, nekaadkeraan, eb kuu inamen amunmo kerewen kowe, ebbed ne yaa ambarakmaab andid kuu kebenaan, angkon yu yaa badmendaab andid kuu kebenaan.
Kwani kowe, kibireb kee ebbed wonong kuu domondene, yu karub yaa. Ye kuu ne weng dakmi ye karub kowe, yembed eb yaa kurikuri keraneene bobnaabban. Kumban, angkon ika konokban keraneeb kuu nembed yedmebdaan kuu eb yoom eb nimakarub yoom duknaniib.” andoon.
Ware amkimo keruune, Abimelekbed ye korok korok baandoone menebiiwe kiyuum weng kuu dakmoone yi uni darewoob keriwen.
Kwani kowe, Abimelekbed Abraham baandoone monoone kaamonenoon “Eb kuu komo kamewen nub yaa kuu? Ne kuu eb yaa ambarakmindo kumbed ne yoom ne nimakarub yoom yaa dabab kee kondewen kuu komo dowad kerewen? Ebbed ne yaa ambarakmi darewoob kwamewen kuu kwamuwi yemanbanbed kwamuwewen.
Komandewed kwamunewen?” andoon.
Abrahambed man yedmoon “Nembed meenaan kuu ambibkin kee ye karub korem kuu God yaa meenindodan kowe ne nene kowekorib, ne wonong nendaniib ande meenaan.
Yu kuu ne daman anam amborom kuu nambe ye dana kowe. Kumban, awaan mamaa kowe, nembed awanaan.
Godbed ne kuu daawoone wengamberekori, nambe yambiwoom kuu domonenekori, ambibkin mamaa yaa wanaan kowe, yu yaa yedmaan “Ne yaa inamen amun ye inamen keraneeb kuu ne yaa ‘Ye kuu nambang’ andimamaneeb.” andoon.
Andoone, Abimelekbed Sera kuu Abraham yaa konekore, angkon sibiyiib buromakauiib ye deme no kakmaniibban awinembiri ye karuwiib baangkanekore,
Abraham yaa yedmoon “Keke ne okad kowe, eb dowakenmo kuna yaa dobaraneeb kuu kui.” andekore,
Sera yaa yedmoon “Nembed kub ambang yaa od yeman silva 1000iib konaniin kuu anam kub kuu ambarakmindo ande yi korem yikaadkeri yeman.” andoon.
Andoone, Abrahambed God yaa kurikuri keroone Godbed Abimelek yoom ye wonong yoom ye deme no kakmaniibban awinembiri ye nima yoom yaa ongmoone wadkeriwen
amborom kuu Abimelekbed Sera nendoone yi kuu oyoomiib kerindeban, Yariman Godbed kebendoon kowe.|U
Kwane, Yarimanbed Sera yaa komo yedmoon kuu kwanoon, kwane angkon yembed Sera yaa ye weng kunduk dakmoon kuu kwamunemo yu yaa kerundoon.
Kowe, yu kuu oyoomiib kerekoru, Abraham kuu kiomnoon yaambed dana mingki wooneen. Dana wooneen kuu Godbed aron kowoon arimbed wooneen.
Abraham kuu Serambed wooneen ye dana mingki kuu yaningko Aisek ande kowoon.
Aron kaning kaningiib dowan keruune, Abrahambed God ye weng yedme kowoon areb dana mingki kad wandoon.
Aisek wooneen yaron kuu Abraham ye weeb kuu 100iib.
Kwane, Serambed yedmeen, “Godbed kube ambon kamiyiib kawoon kowe, kuyaa wengambaraniibdan korem kuu ne yoom kube ambon kamanuub.” andeen.
Andekoru, ika yedmeen, “Karub maambed Sera yu dana woonenu oonenanuun andoonoo? Dowan, karub maa kwane andindo. Kumban, nembed Abraham kuu kiomnoon yaambed dana mingki woonaan.” andeen.
Dana kaine muk animokban keroon yaron arimbed, Abrahambed orok darewoob ongmoone aniwen.
Kwane, Ismael kuu Hagar Idyip wonongbed Abraham ye dana mingki wooneen kuu Aisek yaa daanimo kamoone,
Serambed wedmekoru Abraham yaa yedmeen, “Dabderem yiri dobere no deme awinembiri ye wonongiib yu dana mingkiyiib kee yedmebko winime! Amborom kuu dana kee eb yiribman bi ye yumbon kandi kuu yiminban. Eb bobnaneeb kuu Aisekmo baneen.” andeen.
Kwananduune, Abraham kuu ye niindem aom miin yiminban keroon, amborom kuu Ismael kwangkon ye mingki kowe.
Kumban Godbed Abraham yaa yedmenoon, “Hagar yoom yu mingki yoom yaa miin yiminban keraab. Serambed yedmebduka wengambere kwane, amborom kuu eb yob kuu Aisek yaambed ande kowaniin kowe.
Nembed Hagar yu mingki yaa dana yemoon konaniine ambibkin mimodan keraniib, amborom kuu ye kwangkon eb dana kowe.” andoon.|H
Ware amkimo keruune, Abrahambed Hagar yaa animaniib ok yowo dingkan kadbed ongmiweniib kuu bene yu kandom ari nongkobekore, yedmendoone, yu mingki yoom winiwen. Amiibban koknoon ambibkin Berseba yaa kirinwanmo wuneen.
Ok dowan keroone, dana kuu at kubun aom kowuune diboroone
100 mita areb wenenu dibereenu yukareb yedmeen “Dana kuu bobnandameen kowe, ye bobni wedmaniin kuu ne dowakenban.” andeen. Andekoru, dibuun yirimbed ameng kamande kameen.
Godbed dana ye ameng wengamberekore, ambid arimbed God ye engyumbed Hagar yaa dandoon “Komandewed meeni darewoob kerewen? Unaab! Godbed dana ye ameng kuu wengamboroon kowe.
Dembe wene dana kuu nenkone nemengkane. Nembed ye awoya amun kerundaniine ambibkin darewoob keraniib.” andekore,
Godbed yu indob nandoone okdobon wedmeen kowe, wene ok yowo aom yuundekoru, yu danayiib yunkonuune anoone wene okad maa doberekoriwa,
God kuu dana yaa oonenoone kainoon. Kaine, amiibban koknoon ambibkin yaningko Paran yaa doboroon. Dobere, anambed dingkan yenbandi ye karub keroon.
Kainoone, yawaanbed Idyip wonong benuune awanoon.
Kuyaron kuu Abimelek yoom ye ana nangmidan yi korok yaningko Faikol yoom weneniiwa Abraham yaa Abimelekbed yedmenoon “Godbed eb yaa komo kamaneeb kuu dore awabdimameen.
God yaningko yaambed yedme kowe ebbed neyiib ne danayiib ne awoyayiib yaa nemengkandaab. Ne kuu eb yaa inamen amunmo meenimamiin kowe, neman kangkon ne yaa ambibkin kee doreeb aom kee God yaningko yaambed yedme kowe inamen amunmo meenimame.” andoon.
Andoone, Abrahambed yedmoon “Ee, eb weng kuu God yaningko yaambed yedme kowaan.” andoon.
Andekore, Abrahambed Abimelek yaa kongewoon okdobon ye dowad, amborom kuu Abimelek ye deme karubbed Abraham ye okdobon kuu kandiwen kowe.
Abimelekbed yedmoon “Nekaadban, karub kanembed kwamunoon? Eb kuu ne yaa yedmewindo kowe, kibirebmo wengambaraan kii.” andoon.
Andoone, Abrahambed sibi yenayiib buromakau yenayiib kuu Abimelek yaa baangkanoone yi ayoob dakmenib amob ongmiwen.
Abrahambed ye sibi ediib be nongkoboone,
Abimelekbed ye yaa kaamonenoon “Komandewed kwamune kameeb? andoon.
Andoone, Abrahambed yedmoon “Sibi ediib kee baneeb kuu anam nembed okdobon kuu nidkoon andi ye kumun.” andoon.
Kowe, okdobon yaningko Berseba andiwen, amborom kuu amob ongmiwen kowe.
Amob ongme dowan kerekoriwa, Abimelek yoom Faikol yoom kuu angkon ika Filistia ambibkin yaa winiwen.
Winiiwe, Abrahambed at kaab yaningko Tamaris Berseba yaa kibenekore, kurikuriyiib kubiyiib Yekawono ye Yariman God yaa konoon.
Abraham kuu Filistia ambibkin aom aron doboob doboroon.|U
Amaanbed Godbed Abraham yaa kombon kaamonoon kuu kei. Yembed baandoon, “Abraham!” andoone, “Ne kei.” ande inandoon.
Kwane Godbed daanoon, “Eb dana mingki mimo, mimyob dowaken kerunewen ye dana Aisek kui, ye kuu bidambib Moraia aom nenwene. Kwane, ayekoreb ningkaneewa agedmo keraneene baeb kuu ne yaa kawe. Nembed aangko korokbebdaniin ari kumbed komo daabdaan kuu kwane.” andoon.
Kuye awari amkimo kai, Abraham yaro ye donki nekwene atok kuu nengkane agedmo keri ye dowad baangke ye donki ari nongkobe yerengke yuwekore, ye donkiyiib ye deme karub ayoowiib ye mingki Aisekiib be wonoon, Godbed bidambib yedmenoon yaa.
Kwane wene aron ayoobmim arimbed, Abraham korok kankoone bidambib yedmenoon kuu ambabbed wedmoon.
Wedmekore, ye deme karub yaa yedmendoon, “Yiib yoom donki yoom kiri dobirime. Ne yoom ne dana yoom kuu wene yakuyaambed kurikuri kere angkon ika yiiwiib yaa mananuub.” andoon.
Andekore, atok be ye dana mingki bangkanoona karinoona, ye kuu wekiyiib amoyiib kuu yembed boona, yi ayoob winiwen. Wenoniiwa,
Aisekbed awodki Abraham yaa yedmoon, “Ambe?” andoone Abrahambed inande “Ee ne dana, dakme.” ande yedmoon. Kwanandoona, Aisekbed kaamonoon, “Nub kuu amoyiib atokiib buwen kumban aye ningkane agedmo keri ye sibi kuu kuna?” andoona,
Abrahambed inande yedmoon, “Ne dana, Godbed yekarebmo sibi kuu kondaneena ningkanuuwa agedmo keraneene baeb kuu konanuub.” andoon. Kwane ibmo weniib.
Wenenib Godbed bidambib kuyaa kii andoon yaa nandiwen. Nandiiwa, Abraham kuyaa bot be dingkan nengke agedmo keri yeman wuubekore, animari atok be nongkobekore, dana mingki Aisek kuu nong yerengkane kande atok animari kowekore,
weki kan oone ye dana mingki ayandamoon,
kumban ambid aombed Yariman ye engyumbed, “Abraham! Abraham!” ande baandoona, Abrahambed “Ee, ke doriin kei.” ande inandoon.
Kowe, engyumbed yedmoon, “Eb dana kuu ayaab! Kibireb kee eb wengambere anam ande kwami God yaa kuu wedmaan, eb dana mingki mimo kuu ebka amuknokban, ne yaa kuu.” andoon.
Kwane, Abraham korok kankoone wedmoone sibi ambi durub yaambed amanayod dem aom angkanoon. Wedmekore, ye dana kuu dudmungkoone yaro demboone, sibi kuu Abraham ye dana ye dowad kande aye ningkane agedmo keroone baeb kuu God yaa konoon.
Kowe, Abrahambed aangko kuyaa aningko kuu “Yarimanbed kondimaan” ande kowoon. Kuyaronbed mene kibikee, kangkon kwane yedmimaib “Yariman ye aangko kwarimbed kondaneen.” andimaib.
Angkon ika Yariman ye engyumbed ambid arimbed Abraham yaa baande
daanoon, “Yarimanbed yedmoon, ‘Eb dana mingki mimo kuu ne yaa kuu ebka awine amuknindo kowe, eb yaa neka naningko yaambed wiim aangke weng yedme kowaan kuu kei.
Anam kuu eb yaa amun kerubdeni eb awoya yemoon kabdaniin. Yi kuu ambid ari mindong yemoon areb o karamok kebed yaa kubukbon mimmim kimingkindeban areb keraniib. Kwane yi bondan yi kambong kuu yimbed yeene burundadme dore oonaniib.
Eb yob yaambed ambibkindan korem okad yimin yimin yaa kuu amun keendaniin, amborom kuu eb kuu ne weng wengamberewen kowe.’” andoon.
Andoone, Abraham yoom Aisek yoom ye demedaniib yaa ika winiiwa igakman Berseba yaa yambiwoom winiwen. Kwane, Abraham kuyaa doboroon.|H
Keke kwane dowan keroone, aron maa karub maambed Abraham yaa yedmoon “Eb aagorok Nehor yoom ye wonong Milka yoom kuu karub danayiib wanabiwen.
Nehor ye mingki ibduruk kuu Us, kumbed kuu Bus, kumbed Kemuel (Amaan, Aram yawodki keraneen.),
kwane kuye yondem kuu Kesed, Haso, Pildas, Yidlaf, Betuel yoom wanabiwen.” andoon.
Amaan Betuel kuu Rebeka yu awodki keroon. Milka kuu karub dana kaning kaningiib kei wanabiwen, Abraham ye aagorok Nehor yaambed.
Kwane, Nehor kuu karub dana yena kaningiib wanaboon, ye dungkud wonong Reumambed kuu. Yi aningko kuu Teba yoom Gaham yoom Tahas yoom Maaka yoom.|U
Sera dobureen yu weeb kuu 127iib
kwane bobneen, kambong Kiriat Arba aom, Keenan ambibkin aom. (Kibikee Kiriat Arba kuu Hebron andimaib.) Kwane, Abraham mimyob kowene bobon wene yu dowad ameng kamoon.
Ameng kamekore, ye wonong yu bob angkuun yaambed yaro Hitdan yaa dakmok wonoon. Dakme yedmoon
“Ne kuu norod manaan kwane ne kuu owodman. Okad maa kawibko moonekori, ne wonong yu bob mangka.” andoona
Hitdanbed Abraham yaa inandiwen
“Angkodmi, wengambere. Eb kuu kayabak aromkono darewoowiib, nub aom kuu. Eb dowakenmo kuna yaambed nub bot bob mangkimbon amun kandaneeb kuu yimin. Nub kuu kane ye bot bob mangkimbon keya kee eb dowakenmo kandande meenewen kuu nub ma eb wonong yu bob mangki yaa kuu kebebdaubban.” andiwen.
Andiiwa, Abraham yaro dembekore Hit ambibkindan yaa bumangke kiringkonombed okad badmenekore ika demboon.
Dembekore, yi yaa yedmoon “Yiib kuu ne yaa ‘Mangkaneeb kuu yimin’ anam andibka, Sohar ye mingki Efron yaa ne dowad kaamonime.
Kaamonibko ye mongkob yerenbon yaa botdem yaningko Makpela kuu ne yaa moonoko, nembed ye od kumundin kuu komoyiib kowaneen kuu od amodane moona.” andoon.
Efron kuu Hitdan numun dabokne yi taun kuuk darewoob wiriniwen yambongko kuye nedbimbon yaa dibiib. Yembed Hitdan yi arinambo arimbed Abraham yaa inandoon
“Ne aamkono, kwamunemban. Wengambere, okadiib botdemiib kwaom kuu eb kabda, ne kambongdan kee anam kwanoon andi ye dowad nub weng wengambarande doriib. Eb wonong yu bob kuu mangke.” andoon.
Andoone, Abraham ika yaro dembekore Hit ambibkindan yaa bumangke kiringkonombed okad badmenekore ika dembekore
karub korem yi arinambo arimbed Efron yaa yedmenoon “Ne yaa wengambere. Ne dowaken kuu okad kee kumundinmo od amodani, nod kee kandebko, ne bob kee kuyaa mangka.” andoon.
Andoone, Efron Abraham yaa inandoon
“Ne aamkono, ne yaa wengambere. Okad kuu yu kakman kuu od yeman silva 400iibmo kumban od kakman komoyiib kuye dowad wengbaraubban. Okad kuu kande, eb wonong yu bob mangke.” andoon.
Andoone, Abraham ee andekore, Hitdan yi arinambo arimbed Efron yaa od konoon. Kumundinmo amodoon kuu od yeman silva 400iib od kimingkidan yaa korokbendoona kimingke anam andiiwa kowoon
kowe, Efron ye mongkobon okad Makpela aom, Mamre kangka, kuu taun kuuk ambongko yaambed Hitdan yi indob yi arinambo arimbed Abrahambed amodekore, okadiib botdemiib ayiib mongkoboniib kuu nekwane korem kwaom kuu yariman keroon.
<range>
Kwanekore, Abraham ye wonong Sera kuu mongkobon Makpela yu botdem aom mangkoon, Keenan ambibkin aom, Mamre dia. (Mamre kuu amaan ari Hebron andiwen.)
Kwani kowe, Abrahambed mongkoboniib botdemiib kuu Hitdan yaambed bobkonombon yeman okad moone amodoon.
Kuyaron kuu Abraham kuu anam kiomnoon kumban Godbed od yemooniib animan yemooniib dingkan amongkob yemooniib deme karub yemooniib amun kerunoon kowe,
ye deme karub yembed yiribman korem oonoon ye korok yaa yedmoon “Ne dana ye awani dowad wonong kuu Keenan ambibkindan keye nimambed benaab. Kowe, nambibkin ne okad angka igakman wene ne karubkim doriib yaambed ne dana Aisek ye wonong kuu bene. Kwani kowe, ne dowaken kuu eb dingki kanmene ne yon muudkuk dabderem aom kowekore, Yariman God ambidiib okadiib ye God kuye aningko yaambed ne yaa kwananiin ande amob ongme.” andoon.
<range>
<range>
Andoone, ye deme karubbed Abraham yaa kaamonoon “Wonong yu dowakenban mini korondanuun kuu komo keraniin? Kwamunanuun kuu eb danambed igakman eb ambibkin angka nenwananiin dee?” andoone,
Abrahambed yedmoon “Yii. Ne dana nambibkin kuyaa igakman kuyaa nenwanaab.
Yariman, Ambid Ari ye God, yembed nambe yambiwoom yaambed ne wooneen ye okad yaambed nenmonoon. Kwane weng kundukbed yedmewoon ‘Keenan ambibkin kee eb awoya yaa kondaniin.’ andoon kowe, Yariman God ye engyumbed yedin arinambo weneneena awabdaneena ne dana ye dowad wonong kuu kuyaambed nenmananeeb.
Wonongbed eb yoom igakman mini kuu yu dowakenban keranuun kuu nub amob ongmuwen kuu eb dabab kandaabban. Kumban, ne dana mingki igakman nenwanaab.” andoon.
Kwane, ye dingki kuu ye korok Abraham ye mudkuk dabderem aom yiri kowene yedmoon “Weng kee dakmuub keye dowad kuu kwananiin.” ande amob ongmoon.
Kwane deme karub kuu ye korok Abraham ye yiribman amun amuniib be, Abraham ye kemo angko angkoyiib ari nongkobe yerengke yuwekore, kemoyiib be wonoon. Kwane wene Nehor ye taun Aram ambibkin ari wonoon.
Wenekore, ye kemo kuu taun bunangka okdobon diambon nongkoboona bumangke dibere yiidkiwen. Kuyaron kuu oobnonya, nima ok yuungkok bad winimaib yaron.
Kwane yembed kurikuri keroon “Oo Yariman God, ne korok Abraham ye God, kibik aron kee ne yaa ne korok ye dana ye dowad wonong kawe, eb amob ne korok yaa ongmewen kwananeeb kuu amun yeman, ne korok yaa.
Ne kee doriin kei, okdobon dia. Okdobon kee kibireb yaa taundan yi dana meed nima koyumbed mene yuungkimaib.
Wonong eb deme karub Aisek ye dowad kowewen ne nekaadkeri yeman kuu kui. Yu mananuun kuu ‘Ok maa yunkawebko ana.’ andaniina yedmanuun ‘Ok ane. Angkon, nembed eb kemo ok bangkanda.’ andanuun. Kwananuun kuu eb weng kunduk ne korok yaa kwananeeb kuu nekaadkeraniin.” andoon.
Andeene, Rebeka kuu ok pot darewoowiib kandom ari karine menuun. Yu kuu Abraham ye ayi Nehor yoom ye wonong Milka yoom yi mingki Betuel ye mungkan.
Yu kuu koyu kerengandimbon amun yeman, angkon karub yoom dangindo. Kwane dewene okdobon yiri kubune ok yuundekoru muneen.
Dewunuune, deme karub kirodmo angkane yedmoon “Ok maa yunkawaneewa ananiin kuu yimin dee?” andoon.
Andoone yedmeen “Ee, aamkono, ok ane.” andekoru kirodmo ok nande yiri kowekoru ok koneen.
Kwane ane dowan keroone, yedmeen “Eb kemo kwangkon ok bangkanda.” andeen.
Kwane, kirodmo ok ani yeman yabad aom bunekoru angkon kirodmo wenenu ok yena ika bune yuungkane kemo kuu ok bangkanduune aniwen yimin.
Kwane karub kuu iwari kwane doberene kerendoboroon, anam Yariman Godbed wonong kee kondoon dee kuyaa komboon darobeen.
Kemo ok ane dowan keriiwa, karub kuu yaro gold kumkum kande yu yangdem yaa derenendekore gold yeed ayoob been yu dingki ari deebendoon.
Kwane, kaamondoon “Kub ambe kuu kane? Yambiwoom ne yoom ne karub yoom kibik amnoom kuu ye yoom danganuub kuu yimin dee?” andoone
yedmeen “Nambe kuu Betuel, Nehor yoom Milka yoom yi mingki.
Dingkan yi animaniib yi dangimboniib yiib kwangkon yiib dangimboniib nub ambiwoom kuu.” anduune
karub kuu yiri bumangke Yariman God yaa yubudkane
yedmoon “Kubem, Yariman God yaa, ne korok ye dowad kuu Godbed ye weng kunduk yaamo kwane ambangkoon. Yariman God kuu nenmene ne korok Abraham ye karubkim doriib yaamo nenmonoon.” andoon.
Kwane, Rebeka kuu kabaanmo wene ambiwoom awaan awene yaa komo keroon kuu kwane dandeen.
